140a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong ba ni khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa/ phal cher sang /
140a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzas kyi zhing gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bzod pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs
140a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par chen pa khas kyi na/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sems can thams cadas kyi sems dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa'i sgrub pa shes pa/ dbang po mchog dang ma yin par shes pa/
140b1(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par rab tu zhugs pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te bkur la rang /
140b2(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngags pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par byang chub kyi lam mtha' yas pa mthar gtugs pa/ sems sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa/ nam mkha' ltar mtha'
140b3(dkon brtsegs): yas pa'i byams pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa/ chags pa'i gnas bsgrib pa dang / chong pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ mthu bo che'i lus thob pa/ rdo rje ltar sa/
140b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'jigs pa med par mkhas pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma mog mog por byed pa/ chos thams cad ji
140b5(dkon brtsegs): lba ba bzhin du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa ye shes kyis ston pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la zhugs pas rtag pa dang chad par lta ba'i mtha'
140b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yongs su spangs pabasam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ phyogs bcur
140b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra grags pa/ dam pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par byed pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa
141a1(dkon brtsegs): sha stag la 'di la ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i tog dang / ri bong can gyi tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / dpal brtsegs/
141a2(dkon brtsegs): dang dpal sbas dang / mthu bo che dang / klu dga' dang / klu'i bla ma dang / klus byin dang / gzungs 'dzin dang / mya ngam gyi lha dang / yon tan sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na sgron ma dang / rtag tu lag
141a3(dkon brtsegs): bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / lag na rin po che dang / kun tu snang dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros chen po dang /
141a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang /
141a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa'i blo gros dang / nor gyi blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / rtag tu mos dang / rtag tu dgod cing rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dang / ngan song spong
141a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'chang ba dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rtag par lha dang / spyan ras gzigs
141a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang mi 'dzums pa dang / brjod med dang / rin chenangs pa dang / rin chen sems pa dang / legs par rnam par sems pa dang /
141b1(dkon brtsegs): ngon legs par rnam par bsams pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i blo gros dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / zhing yang dag par bldan pa dang / rin cher/
141b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas dang / dug sbas dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lnga dang / tshangs pa dra ba can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lag bzangs dang / mig
141b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spos kyi glang po dang / bal glang spos kyi glang po che dang / seng ge'i tog dang / don grub blo gros dang / kha lo sgyur dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
141b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
141b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong dang / de ma yin pa lnga'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am cig
141b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur ba la 'di lta ste gaklu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba/
141b7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / chu lha dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / gser mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po 'khor
142a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa brgya stong phrag mang po/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du
142a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / zag zangs ris dang / lag bzangs dang / sa la dang / ta la dang / bde mchog dang / rab sim dang / che rab dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang
142a3(dkon brtsegs): po gnod sbyin gzhan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong mang po/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya
142a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ rang gi gnyen dang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das
142a5(dkon brtsegs): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong
142a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
142a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// gas bla na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na skyed pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang /
142b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de na bcom ldan 'das/
142b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/
142b3(dkon brtsegs): chos ston to// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam
142b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi chog
142b5(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi
142b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs
142b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni/
143a1(dkon brtsegs): sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i
143a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i tsho gas ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing chos
143a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa/
143a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs ni byas pa'i las chud mi za bar 'gyur ro//
143a5(dkon brtsegs): dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo gros rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshig
143a6(dkon brtsegs): ni lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spyod pa'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
143a7(dkon brtsegs): ro rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa tham
143b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar
143b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bden pa'i tshogs ni mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par 'gyur ro// rton pa'i tshogs ni gzhan dag/
143b3(dkon brtsegs): la rag ma las pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// lhag
143b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i tshogs ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni jig skad thos pa'i chos chud mi
143b5(dkon brtsegs): gson par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par
143b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su
143b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad do//
144a1(dkon brtsegs): chogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdub bstan pa 'di shad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na gsang ba pa'i dag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom
144a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu
144a3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag 'od
144a4(dkon brtsegs): snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi nang du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par
144a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni rnam par bsgrub pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub po// ye she
144a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad la legs par bshad pas tshim par bgyid ngo // bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes
144a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs la brtson par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs/
144b1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyid do// ye shes kyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis ni lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so// byang chub sem/
144b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lam la gnas pa ni bdud sdig can gyis thul bar dka' 'o// bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
144b3(dkon brtsegs): te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad ston te mi 'chab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa
144b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de
144b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can tha ma lta smos kyang ci dgos pa la rtsoms te/ khyod spobs par gyis
144b6(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
144b7(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab/
145a1(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid
145a2(dkon brtsegs): par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chang par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spro bar mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba
145a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de khyod la ngas bskul
145a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la rtsoms te/ 'khor 'dir spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
145a5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la
145a6(dkon brtsegs): gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mar me'i mthus/ gzugs su
145a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gzhab de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
145b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsang 'a mam la ga sung ba 'ag par gyi bam gan pasacol de nas gsang ba pa'i dag po lag na rdo rjes / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ba'i blo thos la 'dug ce
145b2(dkon brtsegs): smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams thos nas mi sdang / mi skrag ka skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor legs
145b3(dkon brtsegs): bar khod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bsam
145b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsam gtan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs
145b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yang grogs po dag gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkodag
145b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so// grogs po dag de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
145b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi sdang / mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher bskyed par
146a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan pa la mos
146a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so//
146a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la
146a4(dkon brtsegs): la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs/
146a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug 'dug na/ byang chub sems dpa'
146a6(dkon brtsegs): lus 'gyur ba 'am/ lus tshul 'chos pa kho bos nam yang ma mthong ngo // ngag 'gyur ba 'am/ ngag gi kha gsag kyang ma mthos/ sems 'gyur ba 'am/ sems g.yo ba'ang ma mthong /
146a7(dkon brtsegs): de lus dang lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ tshig tu ni mi smra'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i lus kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mu med/
146b1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa med par gnas so//
146b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bsam gtan gyi spyod lam ston to// rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i dbyangs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i dbyangs
146b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod lam dang / khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khye'u'i spyod lam dang / bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang / bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
146b4(dkon brtsegs): bud mod kyi spyod lam dang / skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod lam dang / gzhon nus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gzhon nu'i spyod lam dang / bar mas 'dul ba'i sem
146b5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bar ma'i spyod lam dang / rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang / yan lag ma tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i/
146b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam dang / gdol pa rkang lag chad pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lam dang / lkugs pa dang 'phye bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dang
146b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phye bo'i spyod lam dang / long ba dang 'on pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la long ba dang 'on pa'i spyod lam dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sems
147a1(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
147a2(dkon brtsegs): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i spyod lam dang / lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'bru'i spyod lam dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
147a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lto 'phye chen po sa 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang / brgya byin gyis
147a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi spyod lam dang / tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang / 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten
147a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong ba'i spyod lam dang / 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod lam dang / dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong gi spyod lam dang / dge slong
147a6(dkon brtsegs): mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la da/
147a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen ma'i spyod lam dang / nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi spyod lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sra can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang / byang chub sem/
147b1(dkon brtsegs): dang sa 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gzugs med pa ni
147b2(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis
147b3(dkon brtsegs): grub cing yongasu mi rtog par kun tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi snong lam skyon mod kyi/ lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o//
147b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis lus kyi las byed mod kyi/ lus kyi dben pa'ang mi 'dor ro// de lus yongs su dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed do// lus la mi lnga bas
147b5(dkon brtsegs): sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gi lus las de dag la bstabs nas/ bdag srog dang phral te sems can de dag la sbyin par byed
147b6(dkon brtsegs): do// khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do// rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do// gzi byin za ba rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sha'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de
147b7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad bdag gi lus las bstabs te/ srog dang phral nas sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do// de'i lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do// de'i lus mi
148a1(dkon brtsegs): da pa mngon par sgrub pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pas rab tu rig par 'gyur ro// de lus kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ gang dag/
148a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ston te// de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas
148a3(dkon brtsegs): byugs te/ de dag pang du 'jog go/ de dag skyes bu de dag gi pang du son pa dang snyis shing bskams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do// mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas skyes bu de dag des yid byung nas bor te song ba
148a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu 'byung ngo // yang zhi ba'i blo gros bya ba/
148a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te/ sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'bru la bya ba de bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khebs par byed do//
148a6(dkon brtsegs): sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me la lag pa'i sor mos g.yogs kyang / de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de lus kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing rim gro byed de/ me tog gi gdugs/
148a7(dkon brtsegs): ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi skon bu dag kyang 'thor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de stong gsum gyi stong chen
148b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod gcig tu mos te/ ri rab kyi snying po 'bar bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba phyir
148b2(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te mar mer 'bud ngo //
148b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems can dag gis kyang mthong zhing shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa de mthong
148b4(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang ga sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la'ang bdag gi
148b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs chen po che chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te/ der sems can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par 'dud cing drag 'tsha
148b6(dkon brtsegs): lo lo de la chos kyang nyan par 'dod do// gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa der yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang nyen po des bdag gi lus
148b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po shi zhing dus las 'das par ston to// der yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ji tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar phyin te 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing / shi nas bde
149a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o// de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du rgyur 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi ston
149a2(dkon brtsegs): kham yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ shi ba'i lus la sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris su skye ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar
149a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyur gyur cig ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa 'grub/ 'dod pa 'grub/ smon pa grub bo// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar byang chub
149a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa nam mkhas bskor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer
149a5(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste/ de na grong dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na nad chen
149a6(dkon brtsegs): po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/ dar sems can dag nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas/ phal cher lus shu pa can dang / lus rnags pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpal dang / thor bu dang /
149a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyi nang rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to// de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nang de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur kyang / sems can de dag gi nang de bas
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bar ma nus so// der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i dpyad ma rnyed de snabs med rten med nas 'di skad du/ nang 'di las ni thar byed pa// lga 'as klu 'am dri za 'am// gnod sbyin dang ni mi mang du/
149b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa su zhig yod// sdug bsngal 'di las thar byed pa// de la nor rnams thams cad gtang // rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bya// byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya// zhes ku tse cher 'don to//
149b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs shes bya bar gyur te/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'as
149b4(dkon brtsegs): papas sems can de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa'ang mthong / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas co chen po 'don pa'i sgra'ang thos so// des de dag mthong zhing thos nas kyang snying
149b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po skyed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// skyabs med pa dang rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/
149b6(dkon brtsegs): des de ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang / ha cang yang mo ring ba zhig tu srog chags nges pa zhes bya bar rdzus te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la
149b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskal pa/ ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na// srog chags nges pa zhes bya yod// de yi sha la sus zos pa/ de ni nang las thar par
150a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par// ji ltar 'dod par de yi sha long zhig del khro med gu she med gnod sems med// 'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no// ni
150a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de ltar na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod de dag na sems canand pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang / srog
150a3(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ nges pas tshigs su gcad pa
150a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di smras so// bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing // bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba// bden pa des ni bdag gi lus la sha/ 'dir ni nams kyang zad par ma gyur cig/ zhi ba'i blo//
150a5(dkon brtsegs): gros de ltar phyogs bzhi'i sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / de'i lus la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon te/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): yang bcad yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar 'gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi bar gyur te/
150a7(dkon brtsegs): nang med cing bde ba dang nyams pa med par gyur to// de nas mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gyi nang thams cad bsal bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas 'dzam bu rmis
150b1(dkon brtsegs): gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag 'di snyam du sems te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa des bdag cag nang las yongs su thar cing nang med par byas te/ bde zhing nyams pa/
150b2(dkon brtsegs): med par byas kyis/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas shig bya'o snyam nas/ de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog
150b3(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs/ khyod ni bdag cag snun pa sman// khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba/ khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol
150b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag gi brgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ nga la nor dang zas skom
150b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med// thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni// dge ba bcu yi las lam srungs// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub smon lam brtan pa thob// phan pa'i
150b6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po nyid kyi sems// gcig la gcig kyang byams pa skyed// brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos// sems can de dag rab dga' ste// shin tu yongs su dag pa yi// dge ba bcu yi las lam blangs// /
150b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de tshun chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de snyed las tha na sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song ba mi dran no// de tshun chad
151a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad de dag shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ de/
151a2(dkon brtsegs): yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bskyod nas/ de la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem
151a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// kha cig ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su
151a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ste/ de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas na sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so// gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
151a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' lus ni mi shigs pa/ sra ba/ btsun pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ rdzus te skye ba ste/ lus den
151a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jig go// lus mi 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'jig ste/
151a7(dkon brtsegs): mes mi tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs shing / dngos rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan te mi shigs pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang /
151b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' mi sems mi cig rtse// lus la lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so// lus kyi dben pa'i mnam nyid kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de na/
151b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su 'jug go// de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben
151b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par byed do// de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid du shes
151b4(dkon brtsegs): so// chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rjes su 'thob po// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis se
151b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhi/
151b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid shes so// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
151b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga lngar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang / khams dang /
152a1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do// kun nas nyon mongs pa
152a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de
152a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid do// mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang / de lta bu
152a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / mi 'byung ba nyid dang / rtsod pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de/ gzugs med pa ni de
152a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang gzugs pa med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid gzugs su mi byed do// de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gi lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go/ lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas na/ lus thams cad ni lus
152b1(dkon brtsegs): med par yang dag par mthong ngo // lus thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rab tu shes so// shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo// de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas chos
152b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no// de chos kyi skyes rab tu phye bas na/ mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// thos pa dang reg pas kyang
152b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi don byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus te/ rtsi'i shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa
152b4(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa legs par byas te/ legs par zin cing legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med do/
152b5(dkon brtsegs): der nad pa gang btsun pa rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ blon po 'am/ rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po
152b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe byed kyis sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad nas/ de dag phrad ma thag tu nang thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde la nyams pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gang sman pa gzhan la med pa sman pa'i
152b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis 'jig rten gyi nad gso shes pa la ltos// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'ang sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang /
153a1(dkon brtsegs): bu mo 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed pa dag gi lus la reg na/ reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyan chang
153a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// lus yongs su gdung ba dang bral bar yang shes so// de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi skus rab tu
153a3(dkon brtsegs): phye ba'i phyir 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin/ kham gyis
153a4(dkon brtsegs): za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de zas thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o// de zas za'ang med pa ma yin/ za'ang khong du
153a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par mi byed do// chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba med
153a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba'ang ston to// de 'chi 'pho'ang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu
153a7(dkon brtsegs): shes so// 'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// skye'ang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu shes so// de chos kyi sku dang ldan/ chos kyi zas dang ldan/ chos//
153b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi stobs dang ldan zhing // chos la rton pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i sku/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku hri/
153b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku/ dpe med pa/ 'dra ba med pa/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyan
153b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa med pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel ba'i sku/ sgyum
153b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la nges par btags pa'i sku/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa nam mkha' khyab pa'i sku/ sems can tham
153b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la mnyam pa'i sku/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i sku/ 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku/ mi g.yo zhing rlom sems med pa'i sku/ gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba thob pa'i
153b6(dkon brtsegs): sku zla/ rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/ sa'i khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chu'i khams kyis ma yin/ me'i
153b7(dkon brtsegs): khams kyis ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyis kyang rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ ma byung ba kun nas ma byung ba'o// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'o// 'byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba'i chos
154a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// mig las ma byung ba'o// rna ba la mi gnas pa'o// snas shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// ldes rab tu maphye ba'o//
154a2(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o// yid kyis nye bar spang ba ma yin pa'o// sems dang mi 'jug pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug/ mi ldog/ rjes su mi 'jug pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin
154a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ni de 'dra'o// de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa la spyod cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen
154a4(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi pa'ang rung / 'dzam bu'i gling yang rung / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa thams cad du byang chub sems
154a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mthong bar yang byed la/ bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de mthong bar yang byed la/ mthong bar snang ba'ang med do// mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar
154a6(dkon brtsegs): snang ngo // mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba'ang ma yin no// sems can yongs su smin par bya bas rab tu phye ba yin yang lus su gtogs pa'i dran
154a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongs su mi nyams so// de lus mi rtag pa dang / lus sdug bsngal ba dang / lus bdag med par yang sems can rnams la ston la/ lus kyi zhi ba'i
154b1(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de lus rab tu dbye ba'ang sems can rnams la ston la/ rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dag gis lus mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang / dmigs pa des/
154b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong // lus rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes shing / de lus kyi las yongs su
154b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par sems can rnams la ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// de bas
154b4(dkon brtsegs): lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhan par ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
154b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam
154b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab bo// nges pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bam po gnyis pa// // gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems
154b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyi skye
155a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rangs ji snyed par sgra la 'jug pa'ang de byed do//
155a2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gi sgra brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / badz+ra dang / smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal brjod pa ji/
155a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ tha na srin bu dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang ma dang / phye ma leb kyi sgra
155a4(dkon brtsegs): dag la'ang ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta bus sems can de dag gi lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i
155a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo // 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ji ltar sems can mtha' ma gang yang
155a6(dkon brtsegs): med// de ltar skyes pa'i rabs de dpag tu med// bskal pa brgya snyed pa shad kyang mtha' ma med// bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya// skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che ba'i tshig/
155a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang bsam pa rgya cher rab ston pa// nam mkha' lta bur gang med bri med pa// 'on kyang dpe don ldan pa bshad par bya// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni
155b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang khargya byin gyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mnga' ji
155b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snga skad du 'byin pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o//
155b3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi ma smad tshig/ gang ba med cing bri med nam mkha' bzhin// sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag/ de dag brjod pa rnam/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): la nan tan nyon// byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang / dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de// tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung bas// legs bshad des ni tshangs pa tshim par
155b5(dkon brtsegs): byed// gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid 'ong sba// de dag de yi sgra brjod zil gyis gnon// rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni// chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung // mi 'am ci yi sgra ngag
155b6(dkon brtsegs): gang yod pa// de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshogs// de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de// de yi tshig gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pa// rol mo'i sgra dang /
155b7(dkon brtsegs): lha yi sgra mang po// chos kyi don 'byor dge bar ldan pa yi// de yi tshig gis kun tu tshim par byed// mi yi 'dren pa'i tshig gi mchog zos nas// 'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu ni// gti mug
156a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi// don rnams gtan la 'bebs shing the tsom med// gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang gnas pa// de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed/
156a2(dkon brtsegs): mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces byang chub tshol// klu dbang dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyi// rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i
156a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra bsgrags pa// thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed// 'dzam gling 'di na tha dad phyogs rnams su// kun na sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi// de yi skad kyi rnam pa bsgrags gyur na// de thos
156a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams thar pa rjes su 'thob// sa bla'i lha dang de bzhin par snang lha// de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'dug/ rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o//
156a5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa khrung khrung ka la bing ka dang // rma bya ne tso khu byu ga shang shang te'u// ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun// ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed// stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spen
156a6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dang byi la ri dgas glang chen bse// rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun// ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed// gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang // rkang mangs dang ni de bzhin rkang me
156a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// bskul dang chad pas bcad dang phan gdags phyir// kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug/ sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na// rab pa ma 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma 'am// dmyal/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud 'gro ga shin che'i 'jig rten dang // lha mi rnams dang de ni skad kyang mthun// ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni// mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med// mtshan ma med cing 'dzin med
156b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba med// mnyam par gzhag pas sems can 'khrug pa med// dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na'ang // de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni/ bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong du yang //
156b3(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed// stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa// de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra thos nas// chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor du// thal mo sbyar te gus
156b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'dud par byed// sems can gang dag rab tu smra 'dod dang // nga rgyal zil non su la'ang mi 'dud pa// de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig zos nas// thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed// 'on pa
156b5(dkon brtsegs): glen pa dag dang lce med dang // rig pa rnams dang gang dag skad 'dzer ba// de dag de yi legs smras snyan thos nas// sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par byed// nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir
156b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris pa rnams// de dag de yi dge tshog dag thos nas// 'gyod pa btul bar gyur cing bsil bar gyur// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra// mi rtag/
156b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra thos nas ni sems can rnams// sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros rtsom par byed// sangs rgyas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa// mtha'
157a1(dkon brtsegs): yas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa// mtha' yas dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes can// de dag rnams kyis yon tan thams cad ni// bskal pa bye mang brjod
157a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang zad mi nus// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni chags pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ thogs pa'am/ nye bar thogs pa 'am/
157a3(dkon brtsegs): dman pa 'am/ rab tu dman pa 'am/ brlang ba 'am/ zher 'debs pa 'am/ mi rdzogs pa 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ khong khro ba 'am/ byung rgyal lam/ bag la nyal ba 'am/
157a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs bag la nyal ba 'am/ mi brtan pa 'am/ gtsam pa'am/ khengs pa 'am/ 'gying ba 'am/ myur ba 'am/ dus ma yin par smra ba 'am/
157a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ sdug pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par che ba 'am/ shin tu chags pa 'am/ rab tu lhod pa 'am/ rab tu sngangs pa 'am/ rab tu dal ba 'am/ dbang po
157a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa 'am/ gdangs nyams pa 'am/ sems nyams pa 'am/ yo ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ mi gsal ba 'am/ skad sub sub po 'am/ ngor byas te smra ba 'am/ 'gal bar smra ba 'am/
157a7(dkon brtsegs): glags pa 'am/ 'byung ba ma yin pa 'am/ gshe bar byed pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ bdag dang pha rol gdung bar byed pa 'am/ tshig blang bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshig gzung
157b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshig dang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa 'am/ 'byor pa'i tshog ma yin pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig gas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gas/ gan/
157b2(dkon brtsegs): 'drid zer ba 'am/ chos dang mi ldan pa 'am/ 'gal ba'am / gnod pa 'am/ dus las yol ba'am/ chod las 'da' ba 'am/ lung bstan pa la thogs pa 'am/ tshul 'chos pa dang khrags
157b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'am/ rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshig gam/ 'byung ba ma yin pa ston pa 'am/ mig 'khrul par 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ som nyi'i tshig gam/ sdug par byed pa'i/
157b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ mi sdug cing gnang du 'bebs pa'i tshig gam/ khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gam/ rang gi phyogs bsten pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi phyogs tshar bcad pa'i tshig gam/ bdag bstod pa la
157b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su chags pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi bstod pa la bar du gcod par smra ba 'am/ 'thing slad dang / gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig gam/ gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba ma yin pa'i
157b6(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ gsang rdol ba'i tshig gam/ ngag bsrungs pa ma yin pa'i tshig gam/ mkhas pas smad pa'i tshig gam/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig/
157b7(dkon brtsegs): kam/ klang 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ ngor mngon du bstod pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa dus ma yin par gleng ba'i tshig gam/ zug rngus gnang du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa/
158a1(dkon brtsegs): kun brjod pa'i tshig gam/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed pa'i tshig gam/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brda sprod pa'i tshig gam/ las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ rjes
158a2(dkon brtsegs): su mthun pa ma yin pa'i tshig mi 'byin to// zhi ba'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i
158a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu grub pas bden pa'i rjes su 'drang ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no// gal te de shing drung na 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung / la la zhig
158a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs nas/ kye skyes bu shing ljon pa 'di la 'dab ma ji snyed cig yod ces zer na/ de shing ljon pa de la'ang mi lta/ 'dab ma la'ang mi bgrang bar/ shing ljon pa de 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa bzhin
158a5(dkon brtsegs): du mi nyung mi mang bar 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ngo // yang gang+gA'i bye ma'i 'bru de brgya phrag ji snyed cig yod/ stong phrag ji snyed cig yod/ 'bum drag ji snyed cig yod/
158a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag ji snyed cig yod/ zer 'brum phrag ji srid cig yod/ khrag khrig phrag ji snyed cig yod/ dkrogs phrag ji snyed cig yod / gtams phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khyad phyin ji snyed cig yod/ mi gyu
158a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji skad cig yod/ dpag tu med pa ji snyed cig yod/ grangs med pa ji snyed cig yod/ gtan pa ji snyed cig yod/ phyin byed phrag ji snyed cig yod/ stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ glang po'i/
158b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ 'grang ba phrag ji snyed cig yod ces 'dri na/ de bye ma de dag la'ang mi lta mi bgrang bar bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa bzhin du 'di snyed cig go zhes byang /
158b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ste/ bye ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis 'di snyed yod do zhe mkhyen pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mngon sum
158b3(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa ma gtogs par lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ rlung lba 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ nyan thos sa
158b4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum ni ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// drang srong snang ba zhes
158b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i dus na bram ze sngo bsangs shes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo // yang de'i dus na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yal ga dang 'dab ma mang pos yog pa/ khor yu
158b6(dkon brtsegs): tshad rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/ der drang srong snang ba de gnas so// de na gnas pa'i tshe des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po de'i yal ga grangs
158b7(dkon brtsegs): la du yod pa lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyi bar du bgrangs te rtogs par byas shes par byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze sngo bsangs shes bya ba grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te/ nyin
159a1(dkon brtsegs): mo gnas pa'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la der song nas/ des zas kyi bya ba byas te/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/
159a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas drang srong snang ba zhes bya bas/ bram
159a3(dkon brtsegs): ze sngo bsangs shes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bram ze mi'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na/ gang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod pa rtsi ba 'am/ rtogs
159a4(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa 'am/ shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa mchis so// drang srong gis smras pa/ bram ze de gang yin/ bram zes smras pa/ btsun pa bdag gis
159a5(dkon brtsegs): bgrang bar bgyi'o// drang srong gis smras pa/ kye bram ze de'i phyir grongs shig/ de nas bram ze sngo bsangs de shing ljon pa de la de la'ang mi lta/ 'dab ma rnams la'ang mi bgrang
159a6(dkon brtsegs): bar skad cig la 'dab ma rtog pa la zhugs nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi 'khrugs drug cu pang steng phrag/ bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag/ bcu gsum dag dang dkrigs
159a7(dkon brtsegs): pa phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa ba gang snang ngo // sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu dang ni ther 'bum phrag/ brgyad stong dang yang bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
159b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dab 'di mchis// bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal// de skad thos nas sngo bsangs la// snang bas smras pa bram ze'i mchog/ khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smra ba// legs so legs so 'dri bden/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): no lo ni khyud kor bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma bdun du mngon shes kyis// 'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs// gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen// khyod ni gzigs pa mi mdzad cing //
159b3(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba mi mdzad skad cig tu// 'dra ba ma rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs// mkhyen 'di nyid kyi'am lha yis bstan// bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs// sngo bsangs kyis smras pa// kye btsun
159b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gson cig/ 'di ni lha yis smras min mi yis te// bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/ nam mkha' zad par grum par 'gyur srid kyi// kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi byed de/
159b5(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shA ri'i bu// bram ze sngo bsangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra// bden la gnas shing don dang tshis dang ldan
159b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam
159b7(dkon brtsegs): zhig bstan par zad kyi/ de bas gong du bstan na byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pa tshad zin pa 'am/ mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba'i le'u
160a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// / gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras
160a2(dkon brtsegs): som zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyis
160a3(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i las rnams byed kying rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed do// mngon par shes pa las kyang ma nyams la/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang byed do// mngon par shes pas
160a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam par rtsen la/ bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// mngon par shes pa la'ang gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la'ang gnas so// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/
160a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad
160a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs thams cad gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs thams cad mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes par/
160a7(dkon brtsegs): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba dang / sems kyi rang bzhin
160b1(dkon brtsegs): la so sor rtog cing lta ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni bsal pa mtha' yas pa rjes su dran pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa/
160b2(dkon brtsegs): ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon du gyur cing / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa zang pa'i rjes su mthun pa dang / dus lal
160b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing dus las mi yol ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa 'phags pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i chad dang mthun pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pade
160b4(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni don zab cing bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi
160b5(dkon brtsegs): snying po sgrub cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mchog yin no// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mthun pa'o// de dag gi mngon par/
160b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba thob pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems
160b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems yongs su dag pa de nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su byang ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rab tu 'dul ba dang //
161a1(dkon brtsegs): legs par sbyangs pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog kyang shin tu zad pa dang / mi skye ba nyid
161a2(dkon brtsegs): du ltung ba'ang ma yin/ bsams bzhin du'ang 'dir skye la/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'khrugs pa'ang med/ bcings bzhin du skye ba'ang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba'ang ma yin/ bcings
161a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'byung ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las grol ba'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o// phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa la gnas
161a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las grol ba'o// des na de grol bzhin du skye'o// grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho'o// grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye'ang theg pa chen po las nyams pa med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis
161a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang phun sum tshogs so// phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongs su tshol yang mi rnyed mi dmigs so// de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su
161a6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs so// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang chos thams cad kyang chos ma yin la/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin par khas len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni kun tu btsal na'ang mi
161a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed do// mi dmigs so// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal na mi rnyed cing mi dmigs pa de la ni bgrang ba gang yang med de/ chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'o//
161b1(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos sam chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa med do// mngon par zhen pa med pa ni chos rnams kyi don to// don la rlom sems su byed pa gang yin de/
161b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid de'i gnod pa chen por 'gyur ro// gang yang rlom sems med pa de la ni don nam/ don ma yin pa de'i mdun na mi 'dug go// don du mi lta ba'i blo ni gang du'ang thogs pa med do// de ni blo thogs pa med
161b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang blo thogs pa med pa de ni chags pa med pa'o// gang chags pa med pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'o// gang rgyun chad pa med pa de ni nyams pa med pa'o// gang nyams pa med pa de'i brtsal ba don med par
161b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// gang gi brtsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ba de la skyon med do// gang la skyon med pa de la bdag gi ba med do// gang la bdag gi ba med pa de la yongs su 'dzin pa med do// gang la yongs su 'dzin
161b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med pa de la 'gyed pa med do// gang la 'gyed pa med pa de ni mi rtsod pa ste/ dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gang dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa de nam mnga'/
161b6(dkon brtsegs): dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'o// gang nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtogs so//
161b7(dkon brtsegs): gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin de la ni kha dog med/ rtags med/ dbyibs med do// gang la kha dog med/ rtags med/ dbyibs med pa de ni nga 'dra ba nyid rjes su rtogs so// de ci 'dra ba rjes su rtog
162a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de 'dra ba nyid rab tu rtogs so// ci'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ dri la rjes su rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i chos phra rab tsam
162a2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan
162a3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba ni gang byams pa'ang yin la/ bdag med pa nyid kyang yin/ snying rje'ang yin la/ sems can med pa nyid kyang yin/ dga' ba'ang yin la/ srog med pa
162a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ btang snyoms kyang yin la/ gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin/ sbyin pa'ang yin la/ sems dul ba nyid kyang yin/ tshul khrims kyang yin la/ sems zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ bzod pa'ang
162a5(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ sems mi zad pa nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la/ sems dben pa nyid kyang yin/ bsam gtan yang yin la/ sems nges par sems pa nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyang yin la rgyu ba
162a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang yin la/ dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams kyang yin la/ yang dag par sems ma/
162a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyang yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang yin la/ spros pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dad pa'ang yin la/ chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la/ lhun gyis/
162b1(dkon brtsegs): grub pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa'ang yin la/ rang byung gi sems nyid kyang yin/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la/ mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyi dbang po'ang yin la/
162b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dbang po rnams kyang yin la/ chos thams cad la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ stobs rnams kyang yin la/ mi brdzi ba'i sems nyid kyang yin//
162b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yin la/ blos rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ lam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin la/ bsgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ zhi gnas kyang yin la/ sems
162b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ lhag mthong yang yin la/ rjes su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom pa'ang yin la/ shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin//
162b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'ang yin la/ yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos yid la byed pa'ang yin la/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dge 'dun yid la byed/
162b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang yin la/ mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la/ gzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang yin la/ chos kyi
162b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'ang yin la/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang yin la/ mi
163a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'ang yin la/ ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ mtshan rab tu thob pa'ang yin la/ mtshan med shi
163a2(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan nyid kyang yin la/ khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid kyang yin/ bdud tshar gcod pa'ang yin la/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i
163a3(dkon brtsegs): sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyang yin la/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yin la/ mi 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems
163a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston la/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
163a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par rtogs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang chub kyi
163a6(dkon brtsegs): sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no// byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar gyur pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes
163a7(dkon brtsegs): su song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhug pa yin no//
163b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags las stong phrag 'dun khri nyis stong ni
163b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dang sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la 'azod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgyad khri ba ni stong ni chos rnams
163b3(dkon brtsegs): kha chos kyi mi rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong brgyad spong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
163b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// ma bskyod par sil snyan dang rol chen
163b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra stong snyed rab tu grags par gyur te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang /
163b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan te/ dge ba'i
163b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o// sems can de dag
164a1(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad la phan thogs par gyur pa yin te/ sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sems
164a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo/
164a3(dkon brtsegs): gros sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te/ 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba de su'i mthu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
164a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ldan zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems/
164a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang
164a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag la'ang blta ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'
164a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba de lus mi snang bar steng gi bar snang la gnas nas/ nga dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang /
164b1(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i spa'ang rab tu phyung nas/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon par/ de nas/
164b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs ba sngags pa zhes bya ba bar sdud de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan das
164b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la sun gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam/
164b4(dkon brtsegs): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes sun gsol lo// yang bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag pos
164b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa chen po 'di bstan to zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa thob par rngo thogs lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
164b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod legs par 'ongs so// khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
164b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang ba pa'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro// sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor de las
165a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la 'dis
165a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas/ 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btab na gang gi phyir 'dri 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de
165a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches
165a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa/ rgya chen po tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brdzun pa zhes bya bar/
165a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
165a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa de'ang 'bye
165a7(dkon brtsegs): pargyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa/ rtswa dag der skyes pa'ang 'jam pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka
165b1(dkon brtsegs): wAr reg na de ba/ rtsa bya'i mgrin pa ltar sngo zhing g.yung drung 'khyil bar g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ skom pa bor na sor bzhi zur du dma' ba/ rkang pa
165b2(dkon brtsegs): bteg na sor bzhi gyen du mtho ba/ ha cang yang mi grang / ha cang mi tsha ba'i rlung chung ngu bsil ba 'dod pa dang mthun par ldan pa'o// sa chen po de'ang baiDUR+Ya sngon pos brgyan pa'o// sems can de rnams
165b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam pa bzang zhing mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad chung ba/ legs par bshad pa'i don kun shes par byed nus pa'i mthu
165b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod do//
165b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do// de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug thub bo// mi rnams kyang dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba med do//
165b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten par ma rab tu 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ rab tu lo legs pa/ yangs
165b7(dkon brtsegs): shing thag gru che ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa re re'ang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong par gyur to// der grong khyer chen po'ang bar bar na dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ grong dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod stong gis bskor ba
166a1(dkon brtsegs): su sa
166a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa bsod su su rgyag sa byas gi sa/ shAn myed pa nga ga sasu pa du ba las bya shA kyi

166a5(dkon brtsegs): byang dang / du gyi de pa bya 'o// rjong rgya ci bye / ngas ma mas
166b1(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyang dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ rin po che'i pad+mas kun nas khebs pa/ ngang pa dang / chu skyar dang / bya gar dang / ngur pa dag sgra 'byin pa bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dag
