166b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang ldan pa'i na chung bud med rin po che'i longs spyod dang 'dra ba sha stag go// de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa
166b4(dkon brtsegs): dag go// de la bu stong du tshang ba yod de/ dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan pa/
166b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen
166b6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang /
166b7(dkon brtsegs): grong rdal ba dang / yul gyi mis bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mer byas/ mchod par byas so// zhi ba'i glo gros rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna
167a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lo bye ba tshang bar yid du 'ong ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / na bza' dang /
167a2(dkon brtsegs): gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa'i longs spyod kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ dge slong re re la'ang rim gro bya ba dang spyad pa'i phyir g.yog gsum gsum phul lo// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal
167a3(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhon nu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la bsti stang dang mchod pa bya bar mos pa dang / chos mnyan pa don du gnyer bas bag yod par gyur te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer ro// de dag
167a4(dkon brtsegs): bag yod cing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / sems kyis nges par sems pas/ ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// de dag bskyed nas steng gi bar snang la ngad pa'i rgyal po bzhin du
167a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / tshong dus nas tshong dus dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mthar gyis rgyu zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra'o/
167a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed par 'gyur// mir skye ba yang shin tu dka' bas rnyed// grogs po dga' dang dad dang chos mnyan pa// 'di 'dra bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed pa dka'// mi dbang rgyal
167a7(dkon brtsegs): po de ni dbyung ste// rab tu zhi bar 'gro ba'i chos ston gyis// bde bar gshegs pa de yi drung du deng // chos thos nas ni bde 'gror 'gro bar gyis// chos thos pas ni ngan 'gro rnam par spong // chos thos
167b1(dkon brtsegs): pas ni bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// chos thos pas ni nyon mongs rnams kyang zhi// bsil ba'i dngos po dam pa thob par 'gyur// de dag tshigs bcad 'di dag rab brjod pas// sa 'di rnam pa
167b2(dkon brtsegs): drug tu rab tu g.yos// wa rnams a la la zhes lan brgya smras// lha yi me tog yid 'ong char du bab// ston pa lta phyir gang dag bskul ba rnams// rkang gnyis mchog gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal na/
167b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag thal sbyar gus bcas 'khod gyur pa// de dag bgrang bas dpag par mi nus so// rgyal bas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas// de dang mthun pa'i chos ni rab tu bshad// bde bar gshes
167b4(dkon brtsegs): khas chos thos bye ba phrag/ sum cu rtsa drug byang chub mchog la zhugs// bye ba brgya phrag gsum tshang mi nyung ba// de dag chos mchog mig ni rnam par dag/ srid par kun tu yid byung sems gyur nas/
167b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag der ni bstan 'dir rab tu byung // gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig de nyid du// bslab pa bzung zhing de bzhin gso sbyong blangs// ston la mchod pa byas shing chos mnyan nas// de dag slar yang rang gi/
167b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas su dong / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gis pha yul 'khor srung la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing
167b7(dkon brtsegs): yangs pa/ bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ ba gam dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / rta babs dang / kha khyer gyis bskor ba zhig byas te/ 'dzam bu gling ril gyis kyang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos
168a1(dkon brtsegs): phyed kyi rin du mi chog pa de lta bu'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ ka ba

168a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ pha rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog dang bcas pa dang / gnyen gyi 'khor dang
168a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der zhugs nas/ pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ bla mar bya ba chen po dang / bsti stang dang / ri mor bya ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug

168a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / khang pa rtsegs pa de sa la gzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs

169a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa rnams la mngon par gdung pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba'o// rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ brtson 'grus gang gis lus yang ba dang /

169b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / chos mi zad pa dang / spobs pa mi zad pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa ste/ bzhi po
169b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag go/ gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyis lus yongs su dag pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs kyis ngag yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab kyi tshogs kyis sems
170a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyis shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su smin
170a2(dkon brtsegs): par byed pas thabs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdud tshar gcod pas shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
170a3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang phrad pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisargyal po yul 'khor srung la chos kyi gtam des yang dag
170a4(dkon brtsegs): par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
170a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ rin thung med pa'i mu tig gi de shal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so// yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal srid thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de la 'phul lo//
170a6(dkon brtsegs): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so// btsun mo'i 'khor de thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
170a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos so// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi gtam thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi
170b1(dkon brtsegs): rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ gos dang rgyan ci thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol bar gyur te/ mngon par gsol nas kyang
170b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho'i bar du lta pa tshangs par spyod pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so// zhi ba'i blo gros de skar rgyal po yul 'khor srung chos kyi rnyed pa phun sum tshogs pas rnyed pa chen po dang ldan
170b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas na
170b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas te/ steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' las khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can du slar 'khor nas rang gi khyim du phyin to//
170b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung dus gzhan zhig na/ zla ba nya ba'i tshe/ me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba'i sred mos tshul gyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir song nas/ de skyed mos tshal chen po
170b6(dkon brtsegs): na gnas shing sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu len pa dang / rtse ba'i dam pas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// chung ma dam pa ma spang pa zhes bya ba dang / dpe med ma zhes bya ba de
170b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rdzing dga' ba zhes bya bar khrus byas/ spos chus gos brlan nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug go// de gnyis der 'dug pa'i pang pa nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzugs
171a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gnyis skyil mo dkrung bcas par rdzus te byung ngo // de nas skad cig de nyid la steng gi
171a2(dkon brtsegs): bar snang las lha rnams kyis/ kye mkhye'u 'di ni chos sems pa'o// kye mkhye'u 'di ni chos kyi blo gros so zhes sgra phyung ngo // khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu zhi nga'i blo gros de ltar 'jig rten du
171a3(dkon brtsegs): khye'u de gnyis chos sems dpa' dang / chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ming du gyur to// de la khye'u chos sems ni btsun mo ma smad pa'i pang pa nas byung ngo // chos kyi blo gros ni btsun mo dpe med mi
171a4(dkon brtsegs): bang pa nas byung ngo // khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu skyil mo krung ma nyams par gnyis kas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing // 'jig
171a5(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon po yul du byung ba dang // rab tu dang pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal ba// de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed grogs po dag/ gang zhig byang chub sems ni ma brjed pa// de ni srid pa'i rgyal mtsho'o gting
171a6(dkon brtsegs): dru byin// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ni yad kyang log/ sems can rgya chen rnams kyis legs par bzung // steng gi phyogs na yan lag ma spad du// 'dren pa mtshan na dus dpog rgyal po ste/
171a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bdag cag chos don gnyer ba dang // 'jig rten mgon yon tan 'byung gnas blta phyir mchis// khye'u de gnyis kyis skyil mo krung bshig nas// de yi tshe na ma yi pang nas babs/
171b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung po ga lar de gnyis dong // rkang par phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar te 'dug/ yab gcig bdag cag mchi ba gsan du gsol// bskal pa bye bar chos rnyed rab tu dka'// de rnyed na
171b2(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub ma thob par// mkhas pa dag ni gzhar yang mi gtong ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba rtag tu rab rnyed dka'// pha ma dag ni chos la gnas pa dang // dal ba 'byor dang chos 'dod grogs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): po dang // mthun par gnas dang bstan la dad pa dkon// 'dun dang brtson 'grus de bzhin bag yod dang // rab tu byung thob rtag tu shes bzhin can// phan pa'i dngos dang gnyen dang ma kheng dang //
171b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha khrel yod thos dang tshul khrims bzang // zhi dul srog chags rnams la snying rje byams// zab mo'i chos la chos kyi bzod ldan dang // brtson 'grus mthun dang sems ni mazhum dang // basbubs
171b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin byed dang // sems las rung zhing dben par gnas pa dang // lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lha dang // mgo dang gos la 'bar ltar chos sems pa// de dag sangs rgyas
171b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan de 'dra 'thob// bdag cag chos mchog gang dag rab brjod pa// chos mchog de dag yab gcig rab rnyed dka'// chos rnams de dag don du bdag cag lhags// da ni rgyal ba'i drung du bzhud
171b7(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi// dkar po'i chos rnams kyis ni yongs zin cing // skad cig gis ni mngon shes lnga thob pa// rjes su dran pa sgom zhing ye shes can// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de gnyis dang //
172a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po du dang bcas shing bud med bcas// byang chub sems dpa' mngon shes thob mkhas gnyis// ston pa yon tan rgyal mchog ga la bar// nam mnga' las ni der
172a2(dkon brtsegs): yang sngon du dong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thams cad 'dus nas gus dang bcas par gnas// de nas rgyal sras chos kyi blo gros smras// byang chub lam de bdag cag bshad
172a3(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// rgyal bas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas// zab mo'i chos kyi gtam ni rab gsung ba// chos rnams 'di dag brten nas byung ba ste// bdag po med cing byed pa po dang bral// nang yang
172a4(dkon brtsegs): stong zhing phyi rol rgyu ba med// chos rnams 'di dag gsog dang gsob yin te// lha dang bya ba dag cing g.yo ba med// nam mkha' lta bur rtag tu gzung du med// bde bar gshegs pas chos gtam rnam
172a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa// rnam pa mang po de dag rnams la bshad// bye ba phrag gsum khrag khrig bdun cu drug/ mi skye bzod pa rjes su thob par gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal po yul
172a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor srung gis zhag bdun gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rang gi khyim du slar phyin to//
172a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gcig pur dben par song ste/ bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug nas/ nang du yang dag pa sa/
172b1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha sta ga na/ gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad kyi
172b2(dkon brtsegs): nang na gang thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis brtag go snyam mo// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis de'i mad/
172b3(dkon brtsegs): la rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa byed du bcug ste/ byi dor legs par byas shing / legs par zin par byas nas/ gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyi ming bris te/ bum pa de'i nang du bcug nas/ rin
172b4(dkon brtsegs): po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa byas nas/ pad+ma de'i steng du bum pa de gzhag ste/ zhag bdun du lha'i mched pa me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad
172b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / rol mo'i sil snyan thams cad kyis mchod do// ming de dag mchod pa'i tshe na/ lha'i bu khri mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par gyur to//
172b6(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun du mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang / de'i bu stong dang / gzhon nu de gnyis kyi mdun du ril gyis gser las byas pa'i khri'u bzang po'i steng du bum pa de gzhag nas/ nang gi
172b7(dkon brtsegs): mis bum pa de'i nang nas ming de rnams phyung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog mar rgyal bu gnon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros shes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur to// ming de byung ma thag tu/
173a1(dkon brtsegs): skad cig de nyid las chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi pang na sil snyan yod pa de dag kyang ma dkrol bar bye ba phrag du ma'i sgra byung ngo // ni
173a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na thams cad kyi thog mar ming byung ba rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs/
173a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros shes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
173a4(dkon brtsegs): gser thub de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba de'i ming byang ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs de de'i
173a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ngo // de ni nga yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon
173a6(dkon brtsegs): nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu ska rags can zhes bya ba'i ming byung bar gyur te/ de ni byams pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu
173a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bu gzhon nu mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu glog gi lha zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni
173b1(dkon brtsegs): tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bzang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me tog dam pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//
173b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ming
173b3(dkon brtsegs): byang ste/ de ni skar ma rgyal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni sman legs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
173b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rdul med ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni lag bzangs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros rgyal po zhes bya
173b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dge ba bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i de banin
173b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par 'gyur ro// de 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu phyogs 'byor pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni mngon 'phags gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gno//
173b7(dkon brtsegs): nu rnam par dag pa bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i
174a1(dkon brtsegs): ming byung ste/ de ni nor dpal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu lus shin tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me
174a2(dkon brtsegs): shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni rin po che 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
174a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen grags pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgya cher bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo
174a4(dkon brtsegs): gros de ltar bu stong yod pa de'i nang nas gcig bzhag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu cod pan brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi bar du byung ngo // de ni yon tan mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs/
174a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chungs blo mtha' yas shes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur pa dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams thams cad dang /
174a6(dkon brtsegs): spun rnams na re/ gang gi tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byas pa de'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci zhig byar yod ces
174a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / blo gros mtha' yas kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra// bdag gis yid la sems can zad pa med snyam bgyid// tshul khrims kyis ni bdag/
174b1(dkon brtsegs): gi smon lam 'di dag gyur// bdag gi smon lam ci 'dra thams cad 'dir gson cig/ khyed ci che tshad ji tsam pa dag bsdoms pa dang // tshogs kyi rgyal po ji snyed de dag kun bsdoms pa// thams cad/
174b2(dkon brtsegs): bsdom pa de skyed bdag gi tsher gyur te// bdag gi dge slong tshogs kyang de kun ma lus snyed// de yis tshigs su bcad pa de ni smras ma thag/ de yi tshe na legs shes lha yis sgra phyung ste// sems can
174b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa khyod kyi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ khyod kyis ji ltar bsam bzhin sems can don mdzod cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung ngu gyur pa gro mtha' yas shes
174b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma pa mos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros bskul pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa dang /
174b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa de'i tshe tshad kyang de srid du 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de srid du 'gyur ro// bdag de ltar mos pas na de'i phyir mos
174b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong du gcig gis ma tshangs pa dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji snyed mdzad pa de snyed de bzhin gshegs pa mos pas byed par 'gyur bas/ thabs
174b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas gzhon nu stong po de dag gis byang chub sems
175a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gzhon nu chos sems dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod gnyis kyis smon kham ji lta bu zhig btab/ chos sems
175a2(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ grogs po dag bdag ni khyed thams cad kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te/ nang na spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad las phyi rol tu ma gyur la/ phyi nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos
175a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad nyan pa dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa de ltar bdag smon lam 'debs so// chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ snag gi gnyen 'tshams dag/ bgres rabs dag/ bdag ni khyed rnams thams
175a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis byang chub thob pa na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul te/ bdag gis bskul bas khyed thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'di ltar 'debs so// zhi ba'i
175a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de gnyis kyang smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das des lung bstan par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung
175a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur pa de khyod kyis gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to/
175a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i bu gzhon nu stong yod pa de dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa zhes bya ba'i bar dag de'i
175b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros btsun mo ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni gsang ba pa'i dag po lag na rdo rje 'ad
175b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros btsun mo dpe med ma zhes bya ba'i bang pa nas rdzus te byung ba khye'u chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba de ni tshangs pa gtsug pud can ni
175b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos kyi blo gros shes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
175b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yin no// rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams kyis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni bskal
175b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po 'di nyid la mthar gyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsam pa thams cad 'byor pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa chud mi zab
175b6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi 'gal ba la ltos/ yul 'khor srung gi sngon gyi tshul gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / zhi ba'i blo gros de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
175b7(dkon brtsegs): bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyang sems can chen po de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o// tshig lhur blangs par mi bya'i// byang chub kyi lan
176a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'dzin papa sa pa nying bar byug byung sa kyi ma ga nas / sa pa mas yang na stsa smrad
176a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong khro ba med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sa btsun pa dang bsdu ba da ngas ze'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / mangs pa'i gnas payin bzlab bdung / byung chub kyi tshigs ces rnamasas mngon pa na/
176a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su spang ba yongs su nong ba dang / babs 'am bab mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge pa'i chos thams cad kyi tshigs sogs pa ste/ 'di ni drung chud kyis mazhes byan
176a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam ni/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / drang ba nyid dang / g.yo med pa nyid dang / spangs panyid
176a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgrib pa med pa nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / sems snyoms pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid yin no// lam de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
176a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde bar 'gro ba'o// kha ma de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gnod pa med pa'o// lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyun chad pa med de/
176a7(dkon brtsegs): lam de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas mi 'khrugs pa'o// lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par rtogs pa'o// lam de ni byams pa chen pos 'byung ba shes pa'i rjes su song ba'o//
176b1(dkon brtsegs): lam de ni snying rje chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'o// lam de ni dga' ba chen pos mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o// lam de ni btang snyoms chen pos snying po'i rjes su song ba'o// lam de ni 'dod pa la 'dod
176b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / gnod sems dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas sdong du ma dang tsher ma med pa'o// lam de ni zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bde bar 'gro ba'o// lam de ni gzugs dang /
176b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang bral bas g.yon can dang bral ba'o// lam de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la legs par brtags pas phyir rgol ba dang bral ba'o// lam de ni nyon mongs
176b4(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// lam de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang bral bas sems rlabs po cher 'gro ba'o// lam de ni sngon gyi de bzhin
176b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhugs pa'o// lam de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che dang mthun pas rin po che chen po sgrub pa'o// lam de ni chags
176b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas rtag tu gsal ba'o// lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par yongs su zin pas dge ba ston pa'o// lam de ni rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa
176b7(dkon brtsegs): mthon dman med pa'o// lam de ni gnod sems dang / za ba dang / khro ba med pas rdul dang bral ba'o// lam de ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror 'gro ba'o// lam de ni mya ngan las
177a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas bde ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na gang la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba med pa dang / lam ma yin pa
177a2(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ lam de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub kyi lam gyi le'u
177a3(dkon brtsegs): sde drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo glos kyis// gsong ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs/
177a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsang ba ci 'dra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i phyogs tsam zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa'
177a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan gyis/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ zhi ba'i blo gros gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
177a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsang ba'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di sa sreg klu'i gsang ba dang / gsung gi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chu'i gsang ba
177a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo bras 'od la de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi dgongs shing rab tu mi rtog pas spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston to// rigs kyi bu de la lha dang si la cig 'dug pa gtso bar byed/
177b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong ngo // zhwa dang mi kha cig 'chag pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag par mthong ngo // lga dang mikha cig 'greng ba gtso bar
177b2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'greng bar mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig nyal ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mnal bar mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig chos ston pa gtso bor
177b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gangashegs pa chos ston par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig mi smra ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi gsung bar gyur par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig
177b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig langs pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa
177b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs par mthong ngo // lba dang mi kha cig mig mi 'dzums par lta ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig 'dzum pa byed
177b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gtso bor 'dzin pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog
177b7(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi kha dog lta bur mthong ngo // de bzhin du la las ni dngul gyi mdog tu mthong ngo // de bzhin du shel gyi mdog dang / bai DUR+Ya'i mdog dang / rdo'i snying po'i mdog dang / sdug gi mdog dang / mu tiH/
178a1(dkon brtsegs): dmar po'i mdog dang / mu tig dkar po'i mdog dang / mdog dmar po dang / mdog dkar po dang / btsod ka'i mdog dang / mdog sngon po dang / mdog gser po dang / rdzang ni
178a2(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / nyi ma'i mdog dang / me'i mdog dang / 'od kyi mdog dang / brgya byin gyi mdog dang / tshangs pa'i mdog dang ba mo'i mdog dang / ldong ros kyi mdog dang / mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong
178a3(dkon brtsegs): ngo la las ni chu'i mdog dang / la las ni mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / sna ma'i me tog gi mdog dang bar shi ka'i mdog dang / pad+ma'i mdog dang / ku mu
178a4(dkon brtsegs): ta'i mdog dang / pad+ma dkar po'i mdog dang / dpal gyi mdog dang / rnam thos kyi bu'i mdog dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang skya'i mdog dang / pad+ma gsar pa'i mdog dang / dpal gyi snying po'i mdog dang /
178a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che byu ru'i mdog dang nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang / an da rnyil gyi mdog dang / nam mkha' dag pa'i gzi brjid kyi mdog dang / lha dang mi kha cig yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par
178a6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/ stong gsum gyi
178a7(dkon brtsegs): spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems na ji snyed yod pa dang / gang yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur la de'i nang
178b1(dkon brtsegs): nas sems can gcig gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon pa/
178b2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba la/ sems can gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re re kyang de snyed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod/
178b3(dkon brtsegs): lam du sems shing mes te mngon par sgrub la/ sems can gcig gi sems kyi mos pa gang yin pa de sems can gnyis pa'i ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
178b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad de/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang /
178b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs dang / spyod lam du shes mod kyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/ thugs kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis
178b6(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par mdzad pa'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lamo gyis kun tu bzhugs so//
178b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la/ gzugs su snang ba ci 'dra ba nye bar gzhags pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de na lhag chad med par/
179a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par snang yang / me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi cog go// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mi dgongs mi rtog par lhun gyis
179a2(dkon brtsegs): grub par sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo
179a3(dkon brtsegs): gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ las las byung ba ma yin/ nyon mongs pa
179a4(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba ma yin/ pha ma las byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin/ sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa ma yin/ rus pa dang chu ba'i bog res sbrel ba ma
179a5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang srog dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/ chos kyi sku dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sku dang /
179a6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med cing rgyu ba med po'i sku yin yang / de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro// gzugs las dben pa chos
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang bar mi 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i
179b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi nang nas kyang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong // kha cig gis ni mi mthong / kha cig gis ni rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug kyang mi mthong / kha cig gis ni thag ring po na 'dug la mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug la mi mthong / la las ni dran pa'i rnam pas mthong la/ g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo /
179b3(dkon brtsegs): la las ni g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mthong la/ dran pa'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pas mthong zhing / bdag gis bltas pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni bdag gi/
179b4(dkon brtsegs): bltas pas mthong la/ gzhan gyis bltas pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni rmi lam na mthong la/ sad pa ni mi mthong ngo // la las ni sad pa na mthong la/ rmi lam na mi mthong ngo // la las
179b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyam par gnazha na mthong la/ langs na mi mthong ngo // la las ni langs na mthong la/ mnyam par gzhag na mi mthong ngo // la las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ mi sdug pa'i rnam
179b6(dkon brtsegs): bar ma yin no// la las ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no// la las ni ma brtsal bas mi mthong la/ brtsal bas mthong ngo // la las ni ma brtsa
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bas mthong la/ brtsal bas mi mthong ngo // la las ni bsgrims na mthong la/ ma bsgrims na ma yin no// la las ni ma bsgribs na mthong la/ bsgribs na ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros
180a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam par ston pa mdzad do// gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu lus dang / spyod pa dang //
180a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ mnyam par gzhag pa/ lus zhi ba/ dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpag par bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma gzung bar mi
180a3(dkon brtsegs): nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog tha dad pas tshad med pa'o// chos kyi sus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// zhi ba'i blo gros nam
180a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab bo// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin
180a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku'ang thams cad kyis rjes su song ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni spros pa med pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang
180a6(dkon brtsegs): spros pa mi mnga' 'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang sems can
180a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lha rtse dper na nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// zhi ba'i blo thos de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu'ang 'ardzun
180b1(dkon brtsegs): bam mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mang 'o// ni ngar bya tho 'di lta ste/ dper nanam mkha' ni gzugs su snang thams cad du zhugs pa'o// ni ba'i blo thos de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pa
180b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can du sdang ba thams cad du zhugs so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na mam mkha'i nang du ni gzugs su sdang ba thams cad 'dus so// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshe
180b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku'i nang du'ang sems can du snang ba thams cad 'dus so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad rnam
180b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'phel lo// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mtha
180b5(dkon brtsegs): na rtag pa'ang ma yin mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin
180b6(dkon brtsegs): te cir yang brjod pa ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang
180b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
181a1(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos 'di ltar mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan
181a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ grong khyer wA rA NA sau na drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na/ shar phyogs
181a3(dkon brtsegs): logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang
181a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor
181a5(dkon brtsegs): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
181a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong la/ skra tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems/
181a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' shugs 'chang gis rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri ba'i stong du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bltas nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag dru
181b1(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas// nges 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rje ba yin gyis/ bdag gis de bas kyang gya ner de bzhin
181b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal bar bya'o snyam nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas/ steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ba phrag cu'i
181b3(dkon brtsegs): bye ma rnyedad 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de nA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i mang po zhes bya ba da ldan bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes te chos kyang smon pa der/
181b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas/ de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad
181b5(dkon brtsegs): dam/ mtha' yang ma dmigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
181b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das de/
181b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
182a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'das pa nas/ khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ring mo rnas
182a2(dkon brtsegs): nas mchis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la/ sku'i tshad dam/ mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so//
182a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gal te shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par steng gi phyogs
182a4(dkon brtsegs): logs su song du zin kyang / bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang yang dpe bzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba 'am/
182a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / gzugs dang / mtshan gyi dper bya
182a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dpe dgod pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o// dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ltar dpe nam mkha' 'o// nas mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs
182a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo// ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo// shes rab kyang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba'ang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang de tsam mo//
182b1(dkon brtsegs): su'ang de tsam mo// gsung yang de tsam mo// thugs kyang de tsam mo// gzugs kyang de tsam mo// mtshan kyang de tsam mo// de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs
182b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku tshad med par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis/ bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas
182b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar du gyur to// tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba
182b4(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
182b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
182b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// nam mkha' mtshangs shing 'dra ba yi// sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig/ pha rol tu ni
182b7(dkon brtsegs): mchi 'tshal ba// de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags// sangs rgyas su ni ngalta slang du// gang+gA'i bye ba phrag brgya yi// bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi// zhing rnams su ni bdag mchis so// de snyed zhing
183a1(dkon brtsegs): du mchis nas ni// pad+ma can gyi zhing du mchis// 'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang // sru yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags// ning de na ni 'dren bzhugs pa// mtshan ni
183a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi snying po lags// de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas// 'di skad du ni bka' stsal to// la las sangs rgyas chos rnams la// dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tsham ste//
183a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag rgyal la skur pa 'debs// 'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste// nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags// de ni sangs rgyas chos dang mthun// gang na'ang de yi tshad ma mchis// nam
183a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'di ni ji tsam par// sangs rgyas kyi ni tshul khrims dang // ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam// nam mkha'i tshad ni ji tsam pa// sangs
183a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas gzugs kyang de tsam ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i dbu gtsug kyang // nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa lags// nam mkha' ji snyed khyab gyur pa// sras kyang de snyed khyab pa la/
183a6(dkon brtsegs): sku yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// 'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab// 'od kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab// gsung gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// thugs kyis kyang
183a7(dkon brtsegs): ni de snyed khyab// thugs kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// byams pas kyang ni de snyed khyab// byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur pa// ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab// ye shes ji snyed khyad gyur
183b1(dkon brtsegs): pa sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyag// gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa/ de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchi na/
183b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams ni kun gong ste// de ni de bas skrag par 'gyur// sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi// drung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba// de snyed byang chub sems dpa'agro
183b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems las rab tu 'byung // byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi// phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas// dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na// de ngas bsod nams ches mang ngo // du mcho
183b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi nan tan du// bskal pa bye ba brjod mdzad kyang // mtha' mar byin par 'gyur ma lags// dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems
183b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsod nams de// stong pa nyid la mos pa yi// bcu drug cha yang mi ri legs// stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas// byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang // dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa/
183b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bsod nams sdud pa lags// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// chos kyi rtogs pa 'di thob nas// de yis byang chub spyad spyod cing // sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur//
183b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcang ba brjod pa na// zhing rnams bye ba rab tu g.yos// lga ni bye ba phrag spong gis// rol mo sol snyan bye ba blangs// sangs rgyas kyi ni che ba nyid// shugs 'chang gis ni
184a1(dkon brtsegs): bshad thos nas// srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po// rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas/
184a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// // bam po bzhi pa//
184a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ni sems can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo // de la gang dag gis
184a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas lta'o// gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi/ sems
184a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyi rim sde ba'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs shes bya ba dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gam ring
184a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brang zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du bzed na/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pas
184a7(dkon brtsegs): kham chad du blangs pa de'ang sdong de nyid na 'dug ste/ de lba dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye gnas
184b1(dkon brtsegs): de dang de dag tu 'phangs pa/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas mi rnyed pa bkres pas nyam chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham babs de byin nas
184b2(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang bkres sgrom dang bral te/ bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// gang dag mon
184b3(dkon brtsegs): bar ltung ba yi dgas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa byang chub tu sems skyed par mi nus pa de dag la'ang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs
184b4(dkon brtsegs): des na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zas can du de ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i
184b5(dkon brtsegs): sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa/ sra ba/ snying po can/ mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang long ka med do// rnag gam// khrag sa
184b6(dkon brtsegs): mchil ma 'am/ ngar snabs sam/ ngan skyugs sam/ mi gtsang ba med kyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste/ khong stong ma yin pa/
184b7(dkon brtsegs): bu ga med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar lci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra'ang / 'jam khyad ka tsa li na di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid
185a1(dkon brtsegs): la lbos/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gis tshe gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
185a2(dkon brtsegs): ba na/ sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ de dag nyon mongs pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang chod de yod do// zhi ba'i blo gros
185a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so// zhe sdang
185a4(dkon brtsegs): kha spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag byams pa 'thob bo// ti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag ye shes kyi snang ba 'thob bo// cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis
185a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes so// ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag tshul
185a6(dkon brtsegs): khrims la mos par 'gyur ro// gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na// de dag bzod pa 'thob po// le lo can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro//
185a7(dkon brtsegs): sems g.yengs pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mdor na sems
185b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dkar po'i chos gang dag bral ba de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i su mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun nga
185b2(dkon brtsegs): nam/ dge ba'i sems la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i su'i
185b3(dkon brtsegs): gsang pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de'ang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa sa mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/
185b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to// sprul mo// sprulo par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten
185b5(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di rang // 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de/ zhi ba'i blo gros
185b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kho dog du ma pa/ kha dog
185b7(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong ba gang phyung ste/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byed pa de'ang lhun gyis grub cing ba sgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon
186a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'du spyad pa mi mnga' bas mdzang de/ ningan bla zlas 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsang ba dang / rtswa'i 'dzin las te/ sgra'i 'brin mas yongs su
186a2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa la 'jug bcung byang tsam zhig bstan du bad kyi/ bgal pa'am/ de bas lhag par 'arjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chu'i 'dzin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan
186a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar byin par mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtswa'i gsang ba busas gyis mi khyang pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog nags rgyas ni blan med pa yang dag pa
186a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par 'gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
186a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la lnga'i dang mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ gsang ba pa'i
186a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje'i spyi bo la gzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so//
186a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gnas zhing rjes su dgyes so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// gsang ba
186b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung na
186b2(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba dang / gsung gi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
186b3(dkon brtsegs): bar sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de gshegs pas thu na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so// gsung
186b4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs 'byung ba 'am/ rngub pa mi mnga' 'o// /
186b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par mi dpyod do// rnam par rtogs pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med na ngag mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang rnam par mi rtogs/ rnam par mi dpyod/
186b6(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par mi mdzad/ mi gsung / mi brjod/ gsung bar mi mdzad kyang / sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung
186b7(dkon brtsegs): ngo snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang / sems can yi ge wAr
187a1(dkon brtsegs): len pa rnams 'di sgyum du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag la chos ston to// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo//
187a2(dkon brtsegs): de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang / spos dang / zhal gyi dkan dang / ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo
187a3(dkon brtsegs): nas sgra 'byung ba'ang med la 'byung bar yang grag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha' las byung na/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gce/
187a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyen pa'i
187a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang /
187a6(dkon brtsegs): mi tshugs pa dang / snyan pa dang / dul ba dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / rnar snyan pa dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying
187a7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa dang / dka' bde skyed pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / kun tu shes par bya ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / dga' bar byed pa dang /
187b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dka' bar byed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / rigs pa dang / 'brel ba dang / zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / glang po che'i sgra smad dang / 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang po'i sgra dang / dri za'i klu dbyangs dang / bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs spags pa
187b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang / lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs lhar snyan pa dang / rnga'i sgra dang / mkhengs pa dang / mi dma'ang dang / sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs
187b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / tshig zur chag pa med pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / mi zhan pa dang / rab tu dka' ba dang / khyab pa dang / chub pa dang / rgyun chags pa dang / 'brel ba
187b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ma smad pa dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / ma rtags pa dang / 'khor kun tu grags pa dang /
187b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang 'dul ba dang / gti mug sel ba dang / bdud tshar gcod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'byung ba ste/ zhi ba'i
187b7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs pa
188a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs
188a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde 'am/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde 'am/ lung du bstan pa'i rje 'am/ tshigs su bcang ba'i rje 'am/ ched du brjod pa'i sde 'am/ gleng gzhi'i sde 'am
188a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde 'am/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde 'am/ rmang du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/ gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde 'am/ dpe 'am/ sngon gyi tshul
188a4(dkon brtsegs): lam/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am/ kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe 'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe 'am/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe 'am/ rab tu 'jog go zhe 'am/
188a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byed do zhe 'am/ rnam par 'grel to zhes 'am/ brjod do zhe'am/ yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so// de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
188a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram/ dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
188a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor yang rung ste/ der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang / de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas
188b1(dkon brtsegs): dgongs par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar shes kyang / chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod
188b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gas
188b3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsungs na/ sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams
188b4(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gyis spyod pa ni tshad med/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa
188b5(dkon brtsegs): de bskal pa tsam du bshad kyang / de bas lhag par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / sems can cham
188b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang / de dag re re'ang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshe tshad
188b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgyad stong du bzhugs pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par
189a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do// sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de'ang /
189a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la
189a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes
189a4(dkon brtsegs): su zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar mi shes kyi/ nam mkha' las 'byung bar shes so// zhi ba'i blos sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
189a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung
189a6(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa dang / spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang / dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang / phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang / dpral ba dang / sbyin mtshams dang / mdzod spu dang /
189a7(dkon brtsegs): spyan dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / 'gram pa dang / zhal dang / mgul nas byung bar shes pa dang / de bzhin du dpung pa dang / phyag dang / sor mo dang / rtsibs logs dang /
189b1(dkon brtsegs): brang dang / rgya ba dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i gnas dang / baR+Ya dang / pus mo'i lga nga dang / byin pa dang / long bu dang / zhabs kyi mthil dang / mtshan rnams dang / dpe byad bzang po
189b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / spu'i khung thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang
189b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang / yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes kyang / zhi ba'i
189b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste btang snyoms pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo'i sol snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par
189b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba byas pa gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de/ 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba ni gang yang med mod kyi/ yongs su sbyang ba byas
189b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa'ang 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskyor na 'byung ste/ 'on kyang de la de bzhin
189b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gsung 'byin par spro ba'ang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug
190a1(dkon brtsegs): par yang 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na brag cha'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la/ de ni nang na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol na'ang ma
190a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gnyis ka med pa las kyang mi dmigs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed pa'ang 'byung la/ de ni nang na'ang ma
190a3(dkon brtsegs): yin// phyi rol na'ang ma yin la/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs
190a4(dkon brtsegs): su song ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go// zhi ba'i
190a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'ang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam pa ci'ang
190a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar nges shes kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo thos 'di'ang de
190a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pan
190b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi tshang ngam/ mtha' gzung bar nus pa de ni kho zas sgra dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang dram byer cas pa'i myu nu
190b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di
190b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brten nas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i
190b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de mjug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig
190b5(dkon brtsegs): tu ring du 'gro ba zhig/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rang gi stan gyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur
190b6(dkon brtsegs): ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas/ de de na 'dug na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i nub phyogs kyi
190b7(dkon brtsegs): ri rab las 'das shing / gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das/ khor yug las kyang 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug na'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam
191a1(dkon brtsegs): bar de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dbog par 'dod kyis// ngas 'di/
191a2(dkon brtsegs): la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstangs pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub
191a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes
191a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/ de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/ 'di/
191a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga ste/ dper na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mi cig shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang / bcom ldan 'das/
191a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gsung sgra thos so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad phyed do//
191a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dngapa
191b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di sad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi can ma'i gdu bu la'achag cing bachis par
191b2(dkon brtsegs): ga las mchis pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
191b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go// nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
191b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis/ khyod kyis 'di lta ste/
191b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul skon cig/ de nas gnas pa/
191b6(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
191b7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus
192a1(dkon brtsegs): seng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che'i grong de skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so// rgyal mo krung de las kyang mu tig giHna
192a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'byung ngo // mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo // 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang bad+ma rnams
192a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo // pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la'ang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
192a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te bsngags pa gsung ngo // de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu
192a5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar stong dang stong
192a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod
192a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shi// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi chos 'phrul de bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub
192b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas btan mo nu 'gal gyi bu chen po 'ang mi zhig gi slang du 'jig chen gyi khams 'dang /
192b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so//
192b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med pa'i
192b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis/ khyod kyi lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig/ gal te mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang /
192b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang / khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs
192b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zha
192b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas/ bdag ni nongs pa can
193a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma ste
193a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas lus dub ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
193a3(dkon brtsegs): mchi ba'i rngo mo thog go// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na/ khyod
193a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis/ khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag
193a5(dkon brtsegs): tshol cig dang / de nyid kyis khyod slar 'khring bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang byin par mi nus
193a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar ram/ lho 'am/ nub bam/ byang ngam/ phyogs gang zhig
193a7(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslang de gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang
193b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gron na bkas pas kyang phyin par minus so// gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang /
193b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/ bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so// de nas gnas
193b3(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe na yan lag lngas la gtugs te/ shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di smras so// mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis
193b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa// ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa// rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su gsol// slar yang zhing der rab tu mchi bar bgyi// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs
193b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des// gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol ba bta pa'i sgra de thos so//
193b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom
193b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'ang ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das
194a1(dkon brtsegs): par song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams
194a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir 'ong bar 'dod nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo // kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slang du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/ dka' stsal/
194a3(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang / 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
194a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal/
194a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od
194a6(dkon brtsegs): zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de na thams cad dang
194a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor nges 'jig rten gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyo bu chen po yan lag lngas /
194b1(dkon brtsegs): gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo ru
194b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brongs te shog cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/ sems kyi rnam par
194b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'dun bskor/
194b4(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas/ spyan sngar yan lag lngas la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs
194b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas/ de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te/ nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
194b6(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni 'di na ci tsam pa de tsam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang
194b7(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshang ngam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad ngam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no// de/
195a1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo// gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang 'ongs pa'i le'u 'di
195a2(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i
195a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdas
195a4(dkon brtsegs): po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems la byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams
195a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskal par yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba'am/ brtsi ba 'am/ brtag par mi nus na/ sems can thams cad kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos / lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros
195a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed par 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/
195a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa'ang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o// de la zhi skad
195b1(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ stong gsum sems can gang yin pa// de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas// bskal par sems can gcig cig gi/ sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can gcig ying ji
195b2(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang // nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes// de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems pa dag ni ji snyed pa// 'jig rten
