195b3(dkon brtsegs): mgon pa chos ston tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do// chos kyi bdag po gsung pa na// dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa// chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi// chos bstan pa yang de tsam mo//
195b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa// sems can snying po'i sku gcig nas// 'od zer byung ba de snyed do// 'jig rten mgon po'i sku kun gyi// 'od zer dag ni
195b5(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa// mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe// gsung gi yan lag de bas mang // dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par rab tu bstan mdzad kyang // sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dbyangs kyi// mtha'
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar
195b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig ni gzugs med pa// thams cad du ni mi dmigs te// de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa// shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar tshig ni yod min te// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// /
196a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar nyon mongs rnam med cing // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung // gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar nyon mongs mid migra/
196a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang // de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gnas pa med pa'ang ma yin no// ji ltar sil snyan
196a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas spa 'byung ba// sgra 'byin byed pa gang yang med// 'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung // de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir// sems can
196a4(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi bsam pa spyod// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang // 'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'// ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar mi yi dbang po'i
196a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par// snang bas sems can tshim par byed// de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtog gsung // sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/
196a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'dug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o// zhi ba
196a7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rnams ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhag go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
196b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sa dra ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ za ba dang / za ba'i rtsa ba dang / za ba sel dang / za ba 'gog ces bya'o// 'dir sdug
196b3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/
196b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa dang / kun tu 'jug byed dang / kun tu 'jug bral dang / kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /
196b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang / dpog pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'jig byed
196b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sum cu rtsa gsum
196b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang / kun snyen dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
197a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod/
197a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang / gnod pa zad dang / gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
197a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ shin tu mi bsrun dang / mi bsrun rtsa ba dang / ldog pa dang / yang dag par ldog byed ces
197a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'phrul dga'i lha
197a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / kun tu rgyal byed dang / rgyal zad dang / rgyal zad sgo zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug
197a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha ha ho dang / ha ha thob byed dang /
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ha ha bral dang / ha ha bral byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug sngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin/
197b1(dkon brtsegs): ba de/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / me mar sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal
197b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sdug pa dang / sdug byed
197b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug pa nyal dang / sdug par 'khor zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i
197b4(dkon brtsegs): lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag pa dang / kun tu 'dzag byed dang / rgyun gcod dang / shin tu 'byung zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug
197b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i mdun ma 'don gyi lha rnams kyi 'di
197b6(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ rma dang / rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / ma ru ba dang / rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /
197b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal byed dang / rnam par rgyal byed dang / rgyal ba mthar byed dang / byed
198a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thob byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i kham zhes bya ba ga/
198a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de'ong chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha hi dang / he hi dang / hu hu dang / ha ra nu san d+hi zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
198a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ oM hi ta dang ni ba hi ta dang / ni ga/
198a4(dkon brtsegs): kr-i ta dang / ni ga ma ni zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba
198a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sten pa dang / yang dag par sten pa dang / zad pa sten pa dang / kun tu skyen pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal
198a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/
198a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs gcod dang / yongs gcod 'byung dang / khyim mtha' dang / rtag tu rnam dag ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa
198b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rjes su 'gro dang / mi 'ongs pa ma yin dang / rjes kyi mtshan
198b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rjes kyi mtshams 'gro zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang
198b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa dang / dag pa can dang / dag pa yongs su dag dang / dag par 'gro zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang /
198b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byu ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mam
198b5(dkon brtsegs): ma ma dang / ma ma medang / ma na nu na ya dang / ma na nu ga ma zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog/
198b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ grol ba dang / grol ba can dang / grol ba'i rtsa ba dang / grol ba bye brag phyed par
198b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa
199a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi bya ba dang / mi byed pa dang / byed bral dang / byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o// 'dir sdug
199a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi lha
199a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin tu mthar thug dang / mi rtog pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi
199a4(dkon brtsegs): bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// gnod sbyin rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// dri za rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// nam mkha' lding rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// mi
199a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am ci rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// 'phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag
199a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang gzhan no// zhi ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po bcu drug tu bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang
199a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang zhan/ brda'ang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/ 'di lta ste/
199b1(dkon brtsegs): yul ka sha dang / bcu pa dang / tho gar yul dang / ya ba na dang / kam po dza dang / kha sha dang / kun dang / rgya yul dang / dar ta dang / ur sha dang / pi lin dang / so ma dang / bras
199b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / da tsaM ba dang / ki ra ta dang / bu lin+da ta dang / pran tra dang / ku ru na dang / lnga len dang / shar phyogs dang / pu ru ra ba dang /
199b3(dkon brtsegs): lho phyogs dang / ka ling ka dang / gcer bu dang / ba na sa ka dang / pa na ta dang / sA la ta dang / khyi gdong dang / we gdong dang / kri ba sha'i gdong dang / spyi'u tshugs pa dang // gnam gdong
199b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / byi phyogs gdong dang / byang mtshams gdong dang / rjes su rgyug dang / rgya mtsho'i khol pa dang / yul mthas gtugs pa dang / ang kur dang / ma kur dang / sna med dang /
199b5(dkon brtsegs): glo bkra dang / phyogs kyi gcer bu dang gshog thogs gcer bu dang / sbrus te 'gro dang rdzogs byed rnam pa dang 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yum
199b6(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas dang
199b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing // rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/
200a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni / bden pa ming tha dad pa bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drag dgu phun pa'i yod de/ bden pa bstan pa/
200a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang / mi khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo
200a3(dkon brtsegs): gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// / bam po lnga pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems
200a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu
200a5(dkon brtsegs): par bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros
200a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA raH
200a7(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu'i lta bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes
200b1(dkon brtsegs): de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing / rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams
200b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tshom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal te yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig gi the tshom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa'i ma
200b3(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing / zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyis the tshom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid la the
200b4(dkon brtsegs): chom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang / des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas// gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de/
200b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tshom gyi dri ba chad par shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar
200b6(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems nyi sel kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa 'am/
200b7(dkon brtsegs): gsung du brjod pa'ang mi mnga' la/ mdzad pa de'ang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// 'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o// 'di ni gsung long/
201a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i tshe/
201a2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags su ma khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na
201a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gisagasang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ me tog rnams
201a4(dkon brtsegs): kyisas kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang btang ngo // de nas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la'ang phog/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la'ang phog cig
201a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor thams cad la'ang 'thor ro// rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go// rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang /
201a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes
201a7(dkon brtsegs): su gzung ba'i slad dubaskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ gsang
201b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
201b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yong
201b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro zhes smras so//
201b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa bzhi ba'i blo gros de
201b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
201b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to// bsnyad do// yang dag par bshad do// gang dag chos bshad do// gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring por mi
201b7(dkon brtsegs): thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mi sdang / mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su
202a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po la/
202a2(dkon brtsegs): nardo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po'ang
202a3(dkon brtsegs): bab po// sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra'ang byung ngo // sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa
202a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la zod pa thob par gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i
202a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so// de nas 'khor gyi khyams de'i dbus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag
202a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo // de dag steng gi bar snang nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
202a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag cha ga btab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod
202b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
202b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang / ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / de bzhin
202b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig pa dang lta bar gyur pa'i sgo glegs bcag nas/ chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang / shes
202b4(dkon brtsegs): dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur te/ 'di chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma
202b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstun pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
202b6(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang /
202b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa
203a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi ches
203a2(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'drang ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa'ang mi gnas pa ste/
203a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i rgyu
203a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ldog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par dpyod pa mi
203a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' thugs 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mi mnga'/ thugs 'khrug pa mi mnga'// thugs sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs g.yeng ba mi mnga'// thugs khengs pa mi mnga'/ thugs dma' ba mi
203a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' / thugs kun tu srung ba mi mnga'/ thugs rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs shin tu rangs pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs g.yo/
203a7(dkon brtsegs): ba mi mnga'// thugs nges par sems pa mi mnga'// thugs dgyes pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa ni
203b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ thugs la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su
203b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brang ba mi mnga'/ rang gi thugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mnga'/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ zugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
203b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/
203b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs phyi rol la gnas pa mi mnga' 'o// thugs de chos rnams
203b5(dkon brtsegs): kha mi 'jug go// thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go// thugs de 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs
203b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa ste/ thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la'ang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug go// rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas
203b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go// gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do// gzigs pas kun
204a1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gi mthong ba dang
204a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna ba'i thos pa
204a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ zag pa zad pa shes
204a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ldan pa'ang ma yin la/ de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa'ang yin no// de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni
204a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so// sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la'ang gzigs so// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon
204a6(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i sdebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen pa'ang bsgyel ba mi mnga' ste// de bzhin
204a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang /
204b1(dkon brtsegs): yang bral kha ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la/ de'i chos thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du'ang mi chags pa
204b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga'// yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa'ang ma
204b3(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'// gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi 'du byed mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams
204b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas mnyam mo// sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go// de la sku'i rtsom pa dang /
204b5(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa'ang mi snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/ de'ang lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas
204b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
204b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma
205a1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ khams la gnas pa ma yin// skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ rang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma/
205a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yinapa kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa/
205a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags
205a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga' 'o// de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub/
205a5(dkon brtsegs): la sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams la'ang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de'ang
205a6(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang
205a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dor la/ sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// /
205b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang /
205b2(dkon brtsegs): dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi spang na'ang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
205b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i du bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyis zhig cig/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// de lha mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu
205b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid//
205b5(dkon brtsegs): ches par mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ka shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da
205b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di bdag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa / shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i
205b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya brgya pa na'ang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du'ang lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun tu ston to//
206a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
206a2(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang / des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje
206a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te/ sngon ni ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na/ khyod kyis de ma mthong ba/
206a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams
206a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thog shing rtag tu 'jug par mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa
206a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dge sprul kyang / de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na'ang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i/
206a7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na'ang 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
206b1(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje ni de wAr ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//
206b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i dka'
206b3(dkon brtsegs): ba skyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la bsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba gang du khyod la
206b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur pa la khyod stobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/ de dag ni tshe'i tshad ba
206b5(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa ni rnam pa/
206b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig ma yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas spyad do// dka' thub dang lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang / lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can
206b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang / brtul zhugs dang dka' thub gang dag de dag gis bya bas kun tu bstan par mi nus
207a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcig btsugs te 'dug par
207a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong // kha cig gis ni nyi ma la lta zhing 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong / kha cig gis ni cig tsog
207a3(dkon brtsegs): por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du sbeng ste 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni khas bub tu
207a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal ba mthong / kha cig gis ni ba glang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong
207a5(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma
207a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa bal ba dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha ri
207a7(dkon brtsegs): gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dgas kyi lpags pa gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa tsir gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sgren mor 'dug pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang
207b1(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang / kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang lo ma za ba dang / me tog zla ba dang / 'bras
207b2(dkon brtsegs): bu za ba dang / sdong bu za ba dang / gzegs ma za ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba za ba dang / zhag drug sbyang ba dang / sha mi za ba dang / rgya shugs za ba dang / nas shin te ma za ba dang /
207b3(dkon brtsegs): ci tse za ba dang / mon spyan sde'u za ba dang / mon sran gre'u za ba dang / bre yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang / chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tshe ba dang / mar gyi
207b4(dkon brtsegs): thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyi
207b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod
207b6(dkon brtsegs): lam de dag dang / dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang stan te/ lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bston par gyur to// brtul zhugs
207b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu dartul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang / sems can
208a1(dkon brtsegs): kra sa
208a2(dkon brtsegs): sa ma su
208a3(dkon brtsegs): sa gas sa sa
208a4(dkon brtsegs): sa sa
208a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe slong dang / sa kyang nab sems dpa' tsha sa sa
208a6(dkon brtsegs): gan sa bya
208a7(dkon brtsegs): sa ma
208b1(dkon brtsegs): bya zhes bya ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug tshang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thu ba de dag las langs te/ klung ner ny+dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig
208b2(dkon brtsegs): rten dang mthun par khrus byas te/ 'bus gtsang mar byas nas klung nai rany+dza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to// de nas grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des/ ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba spang
208b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo // gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
208b4(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu'ang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/ so so nas tshig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos
208b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol cig ces zer ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag thams
208b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi kha zas de dag blangs nas/ thams cad zos kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos
208b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so// de dag tham cad kya nga chub sems pas bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
209a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zas len par spyod pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags shes bya'o// zas len pas sems can
209a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te/ lus stobs dang /
209a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur nas zas zos te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo // de song ba dang sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzangs shes bya bas/ sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras
209a4(dkon brtsegs): pabazlas 'dzin gang zhig mi bskyod pa// sred pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon// sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// legs so zhes te sa
209a5(dkon brtsegs): la spyod rnams dga'// stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag bdar byed// me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs// spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab// lag na gzhong
209a6(dkon brtsegs): thogs de bzhin 'phreng ba thogs// gzhal med khang nas de bzhin par snang ba// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'// de tshe me tog sna tshogs char du phag/ gling bzhi pa dag
209a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams na skyong ba bzhi// ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te// rnam par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// gser gyi dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab// stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu/
209b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa// de ltar stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad
209b2(dkon brtsegs): rab dga' ste// skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun// nam mkha' bai DUR+Ya yi dra bas bkab// dga' ldan rab dang ngag ldan lnga
209b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang // de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas// rgyan 'phreng de bzhin tha gam rnams kyang thogs// mu tig sil ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs// lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar/
209b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra ba gser gyi drar bcas dang // sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bka'// thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir/
209b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang sgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che// rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// 'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul// klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang // lha min mkha' lding mi
209b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am ci kun gyis// rang rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni// 'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen
209b7(dkon brtsegs): po dbang sgyur zhes bya bas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
210a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba ga go cha sra ba mnabs pa / thugs yongs su mi skyo ga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
210a2(dkon brtsegs): khas nges par byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par
210a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/
210a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen
210a5(dkon brtsegs): por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen
210a6(dkon brtsegs): po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos
210a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su
210b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ga tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdung kyi sde rab tu
210b2(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba dang / bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad /
210b3(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos
210b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar ba gas pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang /
210b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la spro bar gyis shig
210b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po de'i yid rab tu dga' nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul
210b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi snying po ga la bder bzhud kyi/ de la khyed kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis
211a1(dkon brtsegs): shigade nas tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa/ wAr bcas
211a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa// lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi lha// thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni 'dul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes 'tshang/
211a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bskang dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrag pa dang // sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /
211a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar gcad dang // sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas
211a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni// sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan par gyur
211a6(dkon brtsegs): la ltos shig kye// 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos// 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin// de ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya// tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang
211a7(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba// de bas lhags pa'i mchod pa de dag ston// me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis/
211b1(dkon brtsegs): dkang // rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lnga yi rnams// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang // dga' bar gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su
211b2(dkon brtsegs): byas// rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas// lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang // lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas/ byang chub rdo
211b3(dkon brtsegs): gdan ni rgyan par byed// smos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs// me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed// sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bkram// byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab
211b4(dkon brtsegs): tu bstan// thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa// de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na
211b5(dkon brtsegs): stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub
211b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen
211b7(dkon brtsegs): po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa/
212a1(dkon brtsegs): phan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad bdag nyid che// de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du// shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud// thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dod
212a2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni nga rgyan par bya// 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang // yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur// tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas// /
212a3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum thams cad ma lus rgyan byed cing // legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// 'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang / khye
212a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gdugs rnams nam mkhar de dag sprul// sA la'i shing rnams me tog mchog smras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul// lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa// de ni
212a5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta bdun bsnams tshad du sprul// rin chen bzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram// kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag lha mi rnams kyis
212a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon ma mthong // sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar// de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'og min lha yi
212a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni// byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed// byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni// 'dod pa'i khams 'dir bkod mchog gang yod pa//
212b1(dkon brtsegs): lba 'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan// phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lhags// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis// byang chub shing ni mngon ducan
212b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs// byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra// lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa// bkod pa de dag
212b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis brjed mi nus/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na// rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od
212b4(dkon brtsegs): des sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun bcad do// klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos
212b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ thams cad dang ldan/
212b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rang gi 'khor la tshigs su bcad pas spras pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od // gnas 'dir lgang nger gyur pas na// kho bo'i lus ni rab tu tshim// sems kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur// kho bos sngon gyi
212b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi// ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni// gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// legs par phye ma 'phreng ba dang // spos dang me tog byug pa dang // gser
213a1(dkon brtsegs): dang nor bu mu tig dang // dung dang rgyan 'phreng mchog rnams dang // rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// ba dan dag kyang bsgreng byas te/
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa la ni mchod pa bya// klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di ma// bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rab tu dga' ba yis// sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya/ de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po
213a3(dkon brtsegs): chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas// gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs
213a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan cig gcig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ spos chu'i char pa ni
213a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs/ klu'i mu hig dang klu'i me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing / klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la der song ste phyin nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas byang
213a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang sil snyan len pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par
213a7(dkon brtsegs): bstod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// skyes bu mchog gis 'ong ni rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur// skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi// nag po'i gnas kyang
213b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis khyab par gyur/ klu 'i rgyal po de yis 'ong mthong nas// rab tu dka' sa de ma tshag smras pa// gser mi chog sa 'od 'ang byung las so// de ring sangs rgya 'byung du gdon mig
213b2(dkon brtsegs): klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te// gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su// byang chub sems dpa' de ni ga lar song // phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug gas kun
213b3(dkon brtsegs): rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes par brgyan// shing mchog kun dang sman dang m+b+ha rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud/ 'dri nu yod pa'i chu klung thams cad mi 'bab mkha' la rlung
213b4(dkon brtsegs): mi ldang // de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur// srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla ba'i 'od mi snang // mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas
213b5(dkon brtsegs): de ring ngan song gsum po zhi// bdag gi gnas su 'ong byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par bgyid// de ring rgyal bar byon par 'gyur gyis dgyer mdzod rangs shing tshim pa skyed// bum pa gang
213b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang // tsa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang // lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas
213b7(dkon brtsegs): pa las// de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed gzi brjid che ldan pa// mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig
214a1(dkon brtsegs): dang de bzhin gser thub ces ni bya ba mchod// mi mchog 'od srungs dang ni shAkya thub mchog de ring bdag gis mchod// bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub
214a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa don du gnyer// sa ni grum zhing ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// su zhig byang chub tu ni sems des lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa// de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan
214a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur gnas ni ma mchis lags// seng ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung zhig zhi ba'i blo gros de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma
214a4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de/ klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng sna
214a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i 'phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang / pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len
214a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la 'thor zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi sdang mi bsnyengs
214a7(dkon brtsegs): bag mi tsha// mi zhum mi dman rab dgyes mi 'khrul chags mi mnga'// sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba// rnam grol drang srong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ngogs bral
214b1(dkon brtsegs): zug rngu bral zhing du la ma rig sel/ 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel// gnas dang skyangs dang things mchis par mkhyen nas ni/ gnas khyod skyabs myong 'jig rten/
214b2(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag tu byung // ji ltar lha yi tshogs rnams dang cing rab dka' ste// mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang // ji ltar gros chen dag kyang 'dor bar bgyid las na// drang srong
214b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po mgon po rgyal bar der 'gyur snyam// dgyed skyed shing dbang drung gshegs mi bsnyengs bzhugs mdzod la// bdud sde pham par mdzod de nyon mongs dra ba drol// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal
214b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod// gang gi ched du khyod kyis bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba dag ni grol phyir dka' ba rnams kyang spyad// khyod kyi
214b5(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te// byang chub mchog la reg par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// bam po drug pa// zhi ba'i bras
214b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste/ 'gro ba na lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa rnga zhing 'dug
214b7(dkon brtsegs): pa des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs pa mthong ste/ lha rnams kyis bskul nas rtswa 'jam pa shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dka' ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin
215a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lta bu/ dga' ba 'khyil pa/ g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba sbar gang blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gal/
215a2(dkon brtsegs): ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa spar gang byang chub sems dpa' la byin te bsam pa zag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros
215a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phyi bar byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtsa'ang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te/ ji
215a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar kho bo bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri gshom pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa
215a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang po 'di'i snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
215a6(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab
215a7(dkon brtsegs): kha dge slong stong tham pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal ba bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/
215b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes de dag lung brtson to// de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med/
215b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na seng ge'i khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam btab
215b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod
215b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang rtswas 'tshe ba bkra
215b5(dkon brtsegs): shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de kha cig la ni rtswa swa ra gang 'bul bar 'gyur
215b6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig la ni rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'bul bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang / byang chub kyi snying
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bo'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang / spos dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
216a1(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / 'breng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te
216a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bdag nyid chen po mi bsnyengs dpa' zhing dul zhi ba// dgyes shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma
216a3(dkon brtsegs): tho mi mnga' ba/ skyon las grol ba'i ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la// khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig/ 'gro ba'i
216a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs nad rnams spangs pa'i phyir byung ba// sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing rab tu dga' ba yis// lha yi me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs
216a5(dkon brtsegs): pa las// 'dod dgra sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring brnyes su nges// shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su// bdud btul
216a6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod// ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod// ji ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don
216a7(dkon brtsegs): du ni// bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyis// shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar mdzod/
216b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo zos de nas byang chub sems dpas rdza sngar gung khyer nas// byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub kyang shing drung du bdag nyid kyis na gding ba bting nas/ khya
216b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi shing la phyag 'tshal te ka lan bdun bskor ba byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dang sa rtswa gding ba bting ma thag tu/ de nas lha'i bu dargyad khri bzhi stong gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs pa
216b3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa/ mtho ba/ yangs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer can/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi
216b4(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyan 'bring rab tu sbyangs pa ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshams so// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas seng
216b5(dkon brtsegs): ge'i khri brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad la bdag nyid 'dug par kun tu bstan par gyur to// lha'i bu de dag gis kyang gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong mi shes te/ lha'i bu re res kyang
216b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi seng ge'i khri la zhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
216b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar shes te de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud
217a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu/ de nas smin mtshams kyis mdzod
217a2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bar nas bdud skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i 'dud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go// 'od des de dag la reg
217a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du spu zing zhes byed de/ rang gi bdud gyi gnas tshig cing mog mog por gyur par shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir gnas 'di dag
217a4(dkon brtsegs): mog mog por gyur par snang ba 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod// rkyen ni ci zhig yod// byang chub sems dpa' 'am// gcig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
217a5(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi gyur grang snyam ste/ rnam par bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag rang
217a6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bdud re re'ang gnod sbyin kha dog rnam pa mang po dang / cha byad rnam pa mang po dang / dbyibs rnam pa mang po dang / chu zheng rnam pa mang po dang / g.yo ba
217a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa mang po dang / mgo rnam pa mang po dang / mtshon cha rnam pa mang po dang / rgyal mtshan rnam pa mang po thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong dag gis bskor te/ sba ba rnam pa mang po smra zhing bdud
217b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos bdud re res kyang bdud kyi 'khor gyis rgyar dpag tshad nyi khri ste khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bkang nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du
217b2(dkon brtsegs): dong ngo // nye ba'i blo gros 'khor chen po de dag dong ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe yid du mi 'ong ba/ mnyan par mi 'os pa/ mi snyan pa/ mu dug ces bya ba dang / pi cig ces bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba
217b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyob cig/ zung zhig/ so cig/ chings shig ces bya ba'i sgra chen po de lta bu phyung bar gyur to// gal te 'dod chags dang mya bral ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgra de mthos la/ zhi ba'i blo
217b4(dkon brtsegs): gros gal te byang chub sems dpas sgra de mi grag par ma byas na ni/ de dag kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing 'chi ba 'am/ shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur ro// de na ni byang chub sems dpa'
217b5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen pos non pas/ sems can la rnam par 'tsho bar gyur tu 'ong zhes sgra de mi grag por byas par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yul li/
217b6(dkon brtsegs): no zhi ba'i blo gros sgra de lta bu de thos kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na spu g.yos par yang ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra 'di dag thams cad brag cha dang mtshungs par legs par rtogs
217b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lhags par rig nas/ bdud sdig can de dag la zlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis zlog par
218a1(dkon brtsegs): byed de// sdig can dag 'phongs par 'gyur ba gdon par dka' ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis ci zhig byas thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdig can khyed ni gyad stobs chung
218a2(dkon brtsegs): ngu la gyang stobs chen po bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas brdabs par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni dpa' bo chen pos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar/ de mod byang chub sems dpas
218a3(dkon brtsegs): pham par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni srin bu me khyer la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mong byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni phub ma spar gang 'drung
218a4(dkon brtsegs): bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni shing sA la chen po rtsa nas chad pa ltar/ ro mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni
218a5(dkon brtsegs): ri dgas kyi tshegs la seng ge bab pa ltar/ ngo mod byang chub sems dpas sngangs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni brjes kyi chu la nyi tshan bab pa ltar/ de mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su
218a6(dkon brtsegs): zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi g.yon can dang gsad par bya ba/
218a7(dkon brtsegs): shor ba ltar/ ngo mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni tshong pa lam brgyags mang po mes tshig pa ltar/ ngo mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par
218b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar/ ro mong byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig cam byed ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa snyam
218b2(dkon brtsegs): de mod byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni 'brog dgon par lam brgyags chad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas 'phongs par byas par lur
218b3(dkon brtsegs): ro sdig can khyed ni rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru zhig pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtsa dang nags
218b4(dkon brtsegs): tsha kha wAr/ de mong byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni rdo ba leb la rdo rje chen po bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ro//
218b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis zlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can rnams zlog par byed kyang / bdud sdig can de dag phyir ma log go
218b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya spong du sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
218b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /
219a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam pa
219a2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba yongs su sbyang ba byas pas lag pa g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon la/ shin tu gzhon pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa brkyang ste/ snying rje chen pos bskyod pa dang / sems can
219a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas spyi bo nas bzung ste lus thams cad la byugs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
219a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du sa chen po la brdabs so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas sa chen po la brdabs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu
219a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yos so// rab tu yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go
219a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs so// rab tu 'khrugs so// kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur ro// rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem mo// rab tu chem chem mo//
219a7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu che ma che ma mo// shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mthe'o// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho'o// lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho'o// byang phyogs
219b1(dkon brtsegs): dma' na lho phyogs mtho'o// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' 'o// dbus mtho na mtha' dma'a'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rnam pa drug dang / lhas chen po bco brgyad du sa g.yos pa
219b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'ur sgra dang / drug chom gyi sgra chen po dang / rdung zhig pa dang / rgyob cig pa dang / chings shig
219b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / song cig pa'i sgra thos so// bdud kyi 'khor gyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthus/ steng gi bar snang la 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di thos so// drang srong nang na drang srong mchog/ de na
219b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste// srog chags kun gyi skyabs yin gyis// 'di la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// zhi ba'i blo gros bdud kyi 'khor gyis sgra de thos pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgyad
219b5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgyad cu kha bu ba tu sa la 'gyel nas/ skyes bu chen po yongs su bskyab tu gsol yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ zhes tshig de smras so// bdud sdig can lhag ma rnams ni dpung gi
219b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'bros par 'dod na 'bros ma nus nas/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral
219b7(dkon brtsegs): te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di bstan pa na/ bdud kyi 'khor de las gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig
220a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag brgyad cus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni
220a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i bu sngon sbyang ba byas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes
220a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltar bdud 'dul ba tshad med pa dang ldan par shes so// kha cig gis ni bdud yongs thams
220a4(dkon brtsegs): cad du ma 'ongs par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rtsa bting ba la 'dug par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug
220a5(dkon brtsegs): par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo //
220a6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing gi rgyal po a shwad thar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing rin po che thams cad
220a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin can du mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la'i srid tsam du mthong zhing / seng ge'i khri shing ta la'i phyed tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub
220b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi shing shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mthong zhing / seng ge'i khri shing ta la phyed dang gnyis srid tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing dpag tshad brgyad khri ba ni stong pa'i bar du
220b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing / seng ge'i khri dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong par mthong ngo // zhwa dang mi bcig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud gcig mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud
220b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen por mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la rtse bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing nam mkha'
220b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
220b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'khod pa de dag gi yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni tshad med par snang ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub
220b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug pa dang / sngon mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med
220b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med pa dag nas lhags te/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra rjod cing shis pa'i sgra dang / bde ba'i sgra dang / kun dga' ba'i sgra dang / mgyogs pa'i sgra dang / myur ba'i sgra dang / legs pa'i sgra dang /
221a1(dkon brtsegs): don yod pa'i sgra dang / dpa' ba'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / rgyas pa'i sgra dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra dang / mi gdung ba'i sgra
221a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma zhum pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang / spong ba don yod pa'i sgra dang / yid bde ba'i sgra dang / rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa rnam par rtsen pa'i spa dang /
221a3(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i sgra dang / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra rjod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub
221a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya
221a5(dkon brtsegs): stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/ des na phyogs bcu'i
221a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la dbugs 'byin cing mchod pa byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang rjes su chag
221a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med la/ bdud kyi sde la'ang khong khro ba med do// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral bas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya ba dang / blta bar
221b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin
221b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ su ma mnyel tAm zhes spun gsol lo// mnyel ba mi mnga' bar byang chub pam/
221b3(dkon brtsegs): rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ kun tu ye
221b4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ spyod yul ma 'dres pa dang ldan nam/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sam/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsabs sam/ chos thams cad la
221b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang sgyur ram zhes yongs su 'dri'o// de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so// sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de mi gas
221b6(dkon brtsegs): so bzhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzum par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su bstar te/ spyan mi 'dzums par byang chub kyi shing la'ang gzi
221b7(dkon brtsegs): so ba lha'i bu stong yang de la mchod do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas/
222a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa dang / rgyal po chen po bani/
222a2(dkon brtsegs): lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong bar gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam
222a3(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi bu ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag go/ gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya nas rgyal po chen po bye ba phrag pa ni brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te/
222a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas lhung bzed bye ba phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyi brlabs nas/ rgyal po
222a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po re re'ang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed pazhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga'
222a6(dkon brtsegs): bde nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ tshong pa ga gon dang
222a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te/ de dag ni sngon 'di skad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar
222b1(dkon brtsegs): zas dbul lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go// de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
222b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub ses
222b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas zung ste// byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de
222b4(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o//
222b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gtsug pud can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ tshangs
222b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi
222b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ sems can chos kyi snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/
223a1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab bo// de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste/ gang gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas/
223a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes smon lam btab pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros tshangs pa gtsug pud
223a3(dkon brtsegs): can nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor bskor bar gsol ba btab kyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
223a4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to// brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu
223a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang
223a6(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshe/ tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis grong khyer wA ra NA sir drang song lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong yod pa/ rnam pa
223a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to// ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams
223b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba drag bcu dang / brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bkra/
223b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ bltan sdug pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par bshams par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po wA ra NA si ga la ba dang / drang srong
