223b3(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba ri dgas kyi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun tu bstan to// de na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i
223b4(dkon brtsegs): khro la bzhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur bar shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
223b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te/
223b6(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul
223b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsnyam par gyur par gnas te/ lag mthil ltar gyur to// stong
224a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba pa 'am/ bdud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa 'am/ mi 'am/ lha 'am// sems
224a2(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mo
224a3(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyis gnod pa med cing gcig la gcig pa ma tsam du 'du shes te byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la
224a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags par gyur to// stong gsum gyi sto
224a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
224a6(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi
224a7(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs gang khyab par ma gyur pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha bzhag
224b1(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin
224b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyod pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ gang yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rte
224b3(dkon brtsegs): du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin
224b4(dkon brtsegs): du kun tu shes te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe chos mnyan pa'i
224b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par 'gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang
224b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de la gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du/ ko'u di n+ya mig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngag gyi sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes
224b7(dkon brtsegs): thos so// bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so// stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong ngo zhes thos so// zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o zhes thos
225a1(dkon brtsegs): so// dben pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig dben pa'o zhes thos so// mi rtag pas 'dul rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so// gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig
225a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pa'o zhes thos so// sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes zos so// rmi lam lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zos so// chu zla lta bus
225a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes zos so// mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi yor lta bu'o zhes thos so// brag cha lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag cha lta bu'o/
225a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes thos so// de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa nyid dang /
225a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar thos so// rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig
225a6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes zos so// mig ji lta ba bzhin du yid kyi bar du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes thos so// de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnam
225a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa dang / kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so// kha cig gis ni skye
225b1(dkon brtsegs): mched bdag med pa'o zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ khams la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ phung por/
225b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin mo// kha cig gis ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni 'gog pa'i sras rnam par grol lo// 'aci
225b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni lam gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni drin pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni yang dag par spong ba'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rang
225b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni spobs kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam du thos so//
225b5(dkon brtsegs): gis ni lam gyi gtam du zos so// kha cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi ga ta maM du zos so// kha cig gis lhag mthong gi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni brten pa'i gtam du thos so//
225b6(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du zos so// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so//
225b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos
226a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de/ dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de dag bgrang ba'i rtog pas lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/
226a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba sbyang ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / bkod pa dang / seng ge'i sgra
226a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
226a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med pa dag ni theg pa gsum la yongs su sbyin par byas so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
226a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te de
226a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gsheg pa bstan pa dang rjes su mthun pa 'am/ cig tu lta'ang lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
226a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ni zab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni/ 'di
226b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gi lus la gnas pas lags kyi/ 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de de bzhin no//
226b2(dkon brtsegs): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir/ chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so//
226b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnas ma yin zhing go sbubs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba 'am
226b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba
226b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par ram mnyan par ram/ bshad par nus pa su zhig yod/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
226b6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid ni de kho na'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang
226b7(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pag
227a1(dkon brtsegs): yin padzin/ chos kyinasu grangs 'di can to/ bsad do// tu bshad do// gsung ba sma byu gapa gang sasmos smra 'di zas namamal
227a2(dkon brtsegs): ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ri'i rgyas po ri rab ni/ mgo bos bsgyel ba'am/ drag pa la
227a3(dkon brtsegs): par nus kyi/ dge pa'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'od la mos par rnam/ dad par ram/ yid ches par yang mi nus na/ byung bar rlu / kun chubabar /
227a4(dkon brtsegs): khar ram/ garung bar ram/ sbyor bar bya ba lnga spos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dan
227a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
227a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi brtan pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de
227a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/ gnyis la ma yin/ gsum la ma yin/ bzhi lam yin/ lnga la ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/
227b1(dkon brtsegs): gyin gsang ba ba'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / yongs su snang ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon btab pa yin
227b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la/ nye bar/
227b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang lags/ gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs
227b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// kun tu rtog
227b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni
227b6(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni
227b7(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ngar 'dzin pa
228a1(dkon brtsegs): dang nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chang pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar ni
228a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig bla dgas so// chad pa dang rtag pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na dmigs pa dang ga rgyu dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun
228a3(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las 'byung ngo // 'jig tshogs la lba ba nye bar zhe na lta ba thams cad nye bar zhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar
228a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi na smon pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gi rtsa ba bcad na yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yalag
228a5(dkon brtsegs): phre'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhe na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na
228a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jig tshogs la lbu ba yongs su shes par 'gyur na nye bar len pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ste/ gnod par mi
228a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni
228b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// sems can kun nas mi spong ba dang / srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi spong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo glos sgru pa
228b2(dkon brtsegs): de ni nang na'ang mig nas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas so// lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i
228b3(dkon brtsegs): gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pas lha bde mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di'ang / zhi ba'i
228b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'dzi/
228b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs shes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di'ang / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs shes bya ba de ni tshogs ma yin pa 'byung ba ma
228b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/ de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun btags pa'o// byung ba ma yin zhing kun btags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam
228b7(dkon brtsegs): par brtag pa ma yin no// yongs su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa/ bslang ba ma yin pa/ shes par bya ba ma
229a1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'o// bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang / bslang ba ma yin pa dang / shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/
229a2(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba/ gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyibaka' stsal pas dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/ gang phyis dmigs
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro// mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni rgyu las 'bar gyi/ rgyu med na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dmigs
229a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las sems 'bar gyi/ dmigs pa med na zhi bar 'gyur ro// // bam po bdun pa// / zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la
229a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa zhi ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do// nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'ang
229a6(dkon brtsegs): mi skyed la/ pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'ang skyed do// bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa'ang spong la/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos la dmigs pa'ang mi spong ngo //
229a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa'ang mi len la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa'ang mi 'dor ro// stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la'ang rab tu rtogs
229b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang lta'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa
229b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang thob ste/ ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la'ang nges par sems la/ bsams bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa'ang mi spong ngo // mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dmigs pa la'ang 'jug la/ dge ba
229b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa'ang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la'ang dpyod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa'ang chung mi gson to// smon pa
229b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i dmigs pa'ang rnam par mthong la/ khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa la'ang mi smod do// shes rab dang thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur te/
229b5(dkon brtsegs): de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sdug pa la sems gnas so// mi rtag pa la dmigs nas/ 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du sems gnas so// sdug bsngal
229b6(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so// bdag med pa la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas
229b7(dkon brtsegs): so// 'dod chags la dmigs nas/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// zhe sdang la dmigs nas/ sems can zhe sdang la
230a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// gti mug la dmigs nas/ sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten cing
230a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas/ sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi sman chen po yang
230a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bstan par sems gnas so// 'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so// zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar
230a4(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so// gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so// gzugs la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar
230a5(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so// sgra la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so// dri la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thob
230a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya bar sems gnas so// ro la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar sems gnas so// reg bya la dmigs nas/ de bzhin
230a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// chos la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas
230b1(dkon brtsegs): so// sbyin pa la dmigs nas/ mtshan dang dpe byang babang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so// tshul khrims la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnas so//
230b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa la dmigs nas/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i pags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// brtson 'grus la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad bsgral bar
230b3(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so// bsam gtad la dmigs nas/ mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so// shes rab la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i
230b4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun bcad par sems gnas so// byams pa la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnas so// snying rje la dmigs
230b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so// dga' ba la dmigs nas/ chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems gnas so// gtang snyoms la dmigs nas/
230b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba la sbyar bar sems gnas so// bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so// ser sna'i skyon la/
230b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so// gnod
231a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ bzod pa'i stobs dang des pa la sems gnas so// le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub
231a2(dkon brtsegs): par sems gnas so// g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ chags pa
231a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas/ theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so// yid 'byung ba yid
231a4(dkon brtsegs): la byas nas/ sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so// ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas/ ngan 'gro ngan song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par
231a5(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so// lha yid la byas nas/ 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so// mi yid la byas nas/ snying po blang bar sems gnas so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa med la
231a6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems gnas so// chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ slob dpon gyi chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems gnas so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la
231a7(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnas so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong bar sems gnas so// tshul khrims rjes su
231b1(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yid la byas nas/ smon pa dang / bsam gtan dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ lha thams cad kyis
231b2(dkon brtsegs): bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnas so// lus yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par sems gnas so// ngag yid la byas nas/
231b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sems yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus byas la dmigs nas/
231b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus ma byas la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/ zhi ba'i blo gros
231b5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su
231b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngos pa'o// chos thams cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
231b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams na sa las skye ba ni/ skye ba ji lta bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la
232a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rdzu/
232a2(dkon brtsegs): gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de
232a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
232a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang / le mo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
232a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag glen pa dang / rmongs pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
232a6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag phan 'dogs
232a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag bsngags pa rjod pa de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro// sems can
232b1(dkon brtsegs): dag bsngags pa mi rjod pa de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po ste'o// sems can su
232b2(dkon brtsegs): dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang / dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas kyi sems skye'o//
232b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su bsrung ba'i
232b4(dkon brtsegs): blo skye'o// sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gdams pa'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag zur tsam gyis go bde
232b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la byang chub sems dpas zab mo'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag rnam par smos pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag pakyi
232b6(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam go rims su phab ste brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag ni
232b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i gtam brjed par bya'o// gang dag tshul khrims la chags
233a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag thos pa la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
233a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod
233a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag gti mug che ba de dag la thos pas
233a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byams pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
233a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag cha mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya/
233a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i gtam dang / byams pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la/
233a7(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i sems kyi gtam brjod pa rgya/ lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la bden pa'i gtam
233b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su mthun par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag sgra dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtum brjod par bya'o//
233b2(dkon brtsegs): dag rgyun mi 'chad pa bstan pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag par rgyun du bstan pa bstan par bya'o// dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par mi bya'o// gang dag sna tshogs kyi
233b3(dkon brtsegs): gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtam la bab pa bstan pa dang / dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing
233b4(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// rnam par
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can smon lam spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phung po la gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i
233b6(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye mched la gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya'o// 'dod pa'i
233b7(dkon brtsegs): khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams la
234a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
234a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// lhas 'dul ba rnams la gcig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga'i ba med pa
234a3(dkon brtsegs): rang yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang de bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nu
234a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bya ba nyung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems drang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang
234a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
234a6(dkon brtsegs): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang
234a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang 'bras bu yod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston
234b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no// bstan du 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
234b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub
234b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur// de'i
234b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming de ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas
234b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid
234b6(dkon brtsegs): de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan pa kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang /
234b7(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsong kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas/ 'od nges 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas te/ tshangs
235a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur
235a2(dkon brtsegs): to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ 'od
235a3(dkon brtsegs): bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra// zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par bzhugs// nyi ma lta bu mun pa 'jom mdzad pa// mi mchog ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan// mos pas zhi gnas
235a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzing du rab tu bzhugs// thugs rje chu bo brtson 'grus stobs kyi 'khrungs// dran pas kha bye yon tan dri zhim ldan// bde gshegs pad+ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dran pa snod bzang zhi gnas
235a5(dkon brtsegs): mar lags te// snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sel mdzad// shes rab mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od
235a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa// rab rib sel ba srid pa skam mdzad pa// 'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni spyong mdzad pa// bde gshegs nyi ma ci srang 'dzum pa mdzad// khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen/ khyod ni
235a7(dkon brtsegs): lhar bcas 'gro na lgang nge ba/ drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams lta// mi mchog ce slang 'di ni 'dzum pa mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
235b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i blo gros gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni// rdo rje thogs nas bskal pa bzang po pa'i
235b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i
235b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bzang po de 'dus nas// de bzhin gshes
235b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs
235b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur// don gyi tshul la'ang 'jug par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu
235b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dngag tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi gan
235b7(dkon brtsegs): na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang srung bar 'gyur/ sems na bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//
236a1(dkon brtsegs): de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
236a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
236a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
236a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de
236a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lha dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di
236a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / be DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / byu ru dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de mig
236a7(dkon brtsegs): mangs ris su byas pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ka tsa lin di ka lhar reg na bde ba/ dar gyi lnga ldi mang pos bres pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas
236b1(dkon brtsegs): legs par brtam pa/ lha'i me tog dang rin po che'i me tog gis khebs par byas pa/ spos kyi snying po dam pas bdugs pa/ snying gi bar snang la lba'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro// 'dzi/
236b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams de ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i yongs su spyod pa dang 'dra ba dang / yid la bsams pas zas dang / skom
236b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan grub cing / legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par
236b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos
236b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang rung ste/ theg pa gnyis kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig gsung bar 'gyur
236b6(dkon brtsegs): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa 'am/ 'tshe ba nyams pa
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ lta ba nyams par mi 'gyur ro// zhar ba 'am/ 'theng po 'am/ sgur po 'am/ gtum po 'am/ rig pa 'am/ mi bsrun pa'am/ kla klo can nam/
237a1(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa 'am/ grum po 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
237a2(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad thub par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon
237a3(dkon brtsegs): tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di dag dang gzhan yang mang du yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de nam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ sku las 'od phyung ba dang / de nas sems can de dag gis
237a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo// de na kha cig ni mngon par shes
237a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi bar
237a6(dkon brtsegs): snang la shing ta la 'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas/ skus khyab par mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
237a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis byang chub sems
237b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa dang 'gal bar byed pa 'am/ zlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do// sems can dad/
237b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni dbang po rno ba/ mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po
237b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur
237b4(dkon brtsegs): ro zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin ga/
237b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye bar gnas pa dang / der lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
237b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon par bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid la bsams pas 'khor gyi khyams su stan dang / zas dang / skom dang / ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas/
237b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod la bab ces gsol pa dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo// bshes gsol nas slar bzhud par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe
238a1(dkon brtsegs): nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad
238a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'di dag dang gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lung
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab
238a4(dkon brtsegs): bo de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis
238a5(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rdo rje de
238a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phangs so// rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// me tog gi char yang bab po// rol mo
238a7(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan brgya'i sgra'ang byung ngo // 'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dag byung ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la
238b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zad chos kyi mdzod// chos rnams rab tu 'byed la mkhas pa 'gro don bzhed// chos la thugs ma zhum zhing
238b2(dkon brtsegs): tu lkug par btang / chos kyi rjes mthun chos sgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag/ yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags// ye
238b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bas ma 'tshal// chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag/ nyi ma lus lhag 'od
238b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog/ tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba// dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sku yang ston la skur
238b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan ma lags// khyod ni gsung yang rjod la sgra skad rtog mi mnga'// khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral// sems can thar par mdzad la sems can 'du shes bral// gang dag khyod bstan
238b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas ji ltar bstan pa ltar// sgrub pa snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs pa// 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni// khyod kyi bka' drin lan ldon nam yang rngo mi thog de nas
238b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi 'phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// me tog gi 'dred
239a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng bas legs par
239a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par gyur cing mig mangs ris su gnas par kun tu snang ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems
239a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mod/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam
239a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pa bdag lung bstan to// smras pa/ ci zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod lung bstan// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thob par bya ba med par lung bstan pa thob bo//
239a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ci zhig thob pa med/ smras pa/ sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu thob pa med do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye
239a6(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rnams thob pa med do// dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
239a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das
239b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du thob pa med do// sbas pa/ gal te thob pa med na 'dir ci zhig lung ston/ smras pa/ mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes sbyang ston to// sbas pa
239b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gang lung bstan/ smras pa/ gang gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba'o// smras pa/ gal te gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur na/ lung bstan pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir ye
239b3(dkon brtsegs): shes gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gal te ye shes gnyis su med pas rab tu
239b4(dkon brtsegs): phye ba yin na/ lung ston pa ni su zhig/ lung ni su la ston/ smras pa/ lung ston pa gang yin pa dang / su la lung ston pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i

239b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gang la gnas na lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi mtha' dang // srog dang /
239b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtshan
240a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas gang yin/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas ni/
240a2(dkon brtsegs): ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas so// smras pa/ ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin// smras pa/ shin tu ma skyes pa ma byung ba'i mtha'i
240a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// smras pa/ ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha'i gnas so// smras pa/ rnam par rig pas ci zhig rig par byed//
240a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par byed na/ rnam par rig pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa thams cad rnam par
240a5(dkon brtsegs): rig par mi byed do// smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes par byed/ smras pa/ gal te kun shes par byed na/ rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te/
240a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do// smras pa/ kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe rnam pa rig pa khas mi len pa'o//
240a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ji ltar na rnam par rig pa khas mi len/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug pa'o// smras pa/ ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug/ smras pa/ gang gin
240b1(dkon brtsegs): don la rton pa'o// smras pa/ don la rton pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi ni don mi mthong ba'o// sbas pa/ don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi ma ngon
240b2(dkon brtsegs): don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o// smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don
240b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na/ de don du gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi
240b4(dkon brtsegs): bu chos don du gnyer ba ni ci'ang don du gnyer ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni chos ma yin te/ chos su mi rung ngo // smras pa/ chos gang yin/ smras pa/
240b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la chos kyi sgra'ang mi dmigs pa'o// smras pa/ gang la chos kyi sgra'ang mi dmigs pa de la chos gang yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la yi ge rnams kun tu mi 'byung ba de nyid chos yin
240b6(dkon brtsegs): no// de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa/ brjod pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu su zhig bdag smra'o zhes smra ba de 'chal bar smra'o// gang 'chal bar smra ba de la chos med do//
240b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba med do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang chos gsung ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal pa gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ sbas pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge
241a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig kyang ma gsungs so// ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/ de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis
241a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// smras pa/ smras na nyes pa ci yod/ smras pa/ ngag gi las kyi nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ngag gi las las nyes pa ci zhig byung/ smras pa/ yi ge la sems pas klags
241a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ nyes pa med pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang mi smra mi rjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do// rnam par rig pa med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o// gang
241a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang / gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de nyes pa med pa'o// smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/ smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa'o// smras
241a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dzin pa'i rtsa baM ci yin/ smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o// smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba ci yin// smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ni rtsa ba'o//
241a6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin/ smras pa/ lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ba ni rtsa ba'o// smras pa/ ci zhig la lhag par dmigs/ smras pa/ gzugs rnams
241a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams la lhag par dmigs so// smras pa/ lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu smras pa/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te sred pa'i bag la nyal lhag par mi dmigs pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de lta bas na sred pa la dmigs pa spang ba'i byin/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to// gsam pa'i bdag po
241b2(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// gnyis su med pa
241b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste/
241b4(dkon brtsegs): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs
241b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs cig nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs shing dgung bdun zhig
241b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ro tsa ga nang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis
241b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar
242a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur lags so// de nas yang khro ba dang sdang ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don
242a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can tshad med pa
242a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po
242a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa'i gnas lcang lho gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te/ zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
242a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad pa rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
242a6(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thar nas song nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste/
242a7(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gnas su phyin to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir//
242b1(dkon brtsegs): ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du
242b3(dkon brtsegs): bsams te/ bdag gis mngon par shes te/ dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgya po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir
242b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs
242b5(dkon brtsegs): logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag
242b6(dkon brtsegs): gis lha'i dang / mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i bkod pa mthong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi kham
242b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ de'i tshe bkod pa
243a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
243a2(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lcang lo can gyi ngo brang 'khor gyi
243a3(dkon brtsegs): dbus na gnas par gnang ngo // 'khor gyi khyams de'ang yangs shing rgya che ste/ shar nub tu mchur ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/
243a4(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhi ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/ phyi ra ni an da rnyil las byas pa/ zung gi 'phrugs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mas brgyan pa/ rgyan
243a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng sna tshogs du mas spras pa/ ras bcos bu du ma bting ba/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng du ma sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldi du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba du mas bkab pa/ pog por
243a6(dkon brtsegs): du ma nas bdugs pa/ lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs bkram pa/ bkra bo/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lu sa sim par byed pa/ sems la dga' ba skyed pa/
243a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ bsngags pa'i bstan pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsa bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/
243b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu du ma bting ba// steng du rin po che'i dra bas bres pa/ bkod pa sngon ma
243b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo // zhal zas re bro ba brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so// seng ge'i khri sa la mi brten pa brgya stong yang
243b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la'ang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po las rdo rjes 'khor gyi ba
243b4(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de'i nung mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i
243b5(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsod pa mang po'ang bshams nas/ nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la smra ba/ grogs po
243b6(dkon brtsegs): dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/
243b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gis/ de la khyed dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan
244a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za
244a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la'ang grogs po dag shes par gyis shig
244a3(dkon brtsegs): kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gis/ de la khyod kyis ngan sems med pa dang / sdang ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
244a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ chos kyang nyon cig ces bsgo'o// // bam po brgyad pa// / de nas
244a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams
244a6(dkon brtsegs): la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/ khyed kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yab
244a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bu nges byas so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag bzangs shes bya ba la smras pa/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
244b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis song las bla ba'i lha rnams nas bzung ste/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gnan/
244b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bya rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis// khyed kyi nang nas su lha 'dod pa de
244b3(dkon brtsegs): myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzangs kyis byas so// de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na skyed pa dang / gzug
244b4(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis dpag tshad khri khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa shams
244b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ nam nangs pa dang pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs pa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la
244b6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshed bab pa gsol pa/ thub pa chen po dus 'di lags// skyes bu gtso bo gshegs su gsol// skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol// skyes bu cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol// thub pa chen
244b7(dkon brtsegs): po gdugs chod bab// rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegs su gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa gshegs su gsol// rkang gnyis cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol// tshul khrims pad+ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs//
245a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par 'phel// slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa// thub pa pad+ma gshegs su gsol/ 'phags pa'i bden par ga nas bcas te// byams
245a2(dkon brtsegs): dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing // bdag med pa yi sgra sgrogs pa// rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol// khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran// byang chub yan lag me tog rgya na// rnam grol
245a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// rgyal ba sdong po gshegs su gsol// shes rab rgya chen zab pa po// ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing // rnal 'byor pa yi tshong pas gtams// yon tan
245a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa// shes rab 'od zer legs par brgyan// slob ma pad+ma kha 'byed pa// thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol// phas kyi nos
245a5(dkon brtsegs): bas mi bskyod cing // rnam thar la sogs sman tshogs can// slob dang mi slob ri dgas gtams// thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba
245a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gdugs tshod bab par mkhyen nas// dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gdugs tshod phab kyis/ chos gos gyon la lhung
245a7(dkon brtsegs): bzed thogs shing zhag bdun byin gyis brlobs la gtsug lag khang skyong skos shig/ de na nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
245b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis bar snang las dong ngo // gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khrod du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i
245b2(dkon brtsegs): dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du dad
245b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len/ 'od zer ni 'gyed/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/ zhing rnam
245b4(dkon brtsegs): ni g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs
245b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la bder
245b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par gshegs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das nam
245b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga'/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/ zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ni mtshungs/
246a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin ltar lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor cing gshegs par rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas
246a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar
246a3(dkon brtsegs): po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / yongs su 'du dang / yongs su 'dra chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / sbal dang / s+tha la chen po dang / mdog
246a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'kho lo chen po dang / dri zhim dang / pad+ma 'dab brgya dang / 'dab stong dang / skar 'od dang / skar ma dga' dang / kun tu
246a5(dkon brtsegs): bsrung dang / bsung rtag dang / rtag tu me tog chags dang / mig tu sdug pa de dag dang / me tog gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro// gdugs dang /
246a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag kyang bsgreng ngo // rol mo sil snyan brgya stong yang len to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /
246a7(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs
246b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rol ma'i sgra dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa dag dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan rdzo
246b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams dang zabs cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang du bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sa chen po dal zhing mi drag la sems
246b3(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la mi gnod par g.yos par gyur to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas/ myur ba myur bar
246b4(dkon brtsegs): gong du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom
246b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo sa phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyang
246b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// btsun mo'i 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan
246b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las brtsams te/ 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de dag la/ de lta bu'i gtam
247a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags khri nyis stong gis byang chub sems bskyed do//
247a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
247a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang /
247a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad thogs shing sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang
247a5(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun
247a6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
247a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te sil snyan dang rol mo byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa
247b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas par ldan cig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khams su spyan drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi rten pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyis
247b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i gdan ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang bstan ci rigs pa dgal 'khod do//
247b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa de dag dang / lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed de bzhin gshegs
247b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la bsu bgyis shig/ mchod pa dang rim gro gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang // de la gang dag yi rang dang // zhal tar bya ba byed pa ni// de dag bsod nams skal ba can// de dag
247b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan chung ba min// zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa dang / zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po long zhig
247b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang seng ge'i khri bkod pa'ang mthong ngo // de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 'on te gsang
247b7(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am/ su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de dag gis bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyi rlabs yin te/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na
248a1(dkon brtsegs): shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
248a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa der/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mthong nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi
248a3(dkon brtsegs): khyams 'dir byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / dri za dang /
248a4(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
248a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/
248a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus la lhan cig tu tshur shog/ ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
248a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ rang gi lag nas gus par bsti stang du byas te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa mang po/
248b1(dkon brtsegs): ro bro ba mang po du ma dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
248b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstabs te tshim par byas so// bstabs te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs
248b3(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas/
248b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// lcang lo can du gshegs nas bshos gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o//
248b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ ci nas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed par
248b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang /
248b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / khyad par gyis khyad par du mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa/ bcom
249a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la
249a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gang la zhugs na/ khyad par du mngon par 'a/
249a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing / nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyed la bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang
249a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsam
249a5(dkon brtsegs): ba thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de dad pa yin/ dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lta 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par 'dod pa dang /
249a6(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med par btang ba gtong ba dang / lag brkyang ste gtong ba la dga' ba dang / mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin pa 'gyed pa la dga' nga dang
249a7(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / so ma nyid med
249b1(dkon brtsegs): la the tsom mi za zhing / yid gnyis mi za ba yin// de dkar po dang nag ro'i las rnas kyi rnam par smin pa chung mi za bar rig nas/ srog gi phyir yang mi bya ba mi byed dang / de srog gcod pa
249b2(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyil pa dang / brnab sems
249b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa yin no// de dang par gyur nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang dag yang dag par
249b4(dkon brtsegs): song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / nges pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la mngon par
249b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo zlogs bod par smra zhing gtsam bur mi smra ba dang / dge ba'i bsam pa
249b6(dkon brtsegs): can dang / mi dge ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / ma khengs pa dang / mu cor smra ba ma yin pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shin tu mnyam par gan
249b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / som nyi las nges par brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / yang srid pa las
250a1(dkon brtsegs): brgal ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnam pa de lta bu la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas bsten
250a2(dkon brtsegs): to bsnyen to// bsnyen bkur byed do// mnyes par byed cing / mi gnyes par mi byed la/ dgyes par byed de/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas pas/ chos kyi
250a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam gyis yang dag par sten/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag
250a4(dkon brtsegs): par ston/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar yang dag par ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa'o//
250a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ser sna'o// 'di ni ser sna'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims so// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni 'azod pa
250a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni bsam gtan no// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o// drin
250a7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab po// 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab bo// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni ru
250b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi
250b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni ga gi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par sbyin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par
250b3(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spang ba'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni dge ba'o// 'di ni mi dge ba'o// 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di ni
250b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag
250b5(dkon brtsegs): par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug// yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag ga bar mdzad do// de nas de dag snong du rung bar mkhyen nas/ bab mo'i gtam 'di ste/
250b6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtams/ smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam
250b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam rab tu ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/ 'di yod
251a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'di 'byung // 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/ 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams//
251a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen
251a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshor ba// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
251a4(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med pa'i
251a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pa/
251a6(dkon brtsegs): ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas
251a7(dkon brtsegs): sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre
251b1(dkon brtsegs): drugs 'don pa dang / drug bsngal pa dang / ying mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de skur sdug bsngal kyi phung po chen po 'bar zhig 'ang 'gag par gyur mo/
