251b2(dkon brtsegs): de la don dam par na 'byung ba 'am/ 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa
251b3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o// 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa 'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun tu gti
251b4(dkon brtsegs): mug pas khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma
251b5(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu gti mug pa de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med de/ gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa
251b6(dkon brtsegs): de la 'jug pa med/ ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o// de chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do// the tshom mi za'o// chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs
251b7(dkon brtsegs): la mi chags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// de mig dang / gzugs dang // mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// /
252a1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
252a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so// grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// dam
252a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'ang/
252a4(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos
252a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro// chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang /
252a6(dkon brtsegs): bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur pa ste/ de na tshod gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas/ na tshod mdzes
252a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu byung nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams/ dge ba'i
252b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsam pa thob bo// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to// sgrub pa snying por byed kyi/ tshig lhur len na
252b2(dkon brtsegs): blo dang ldan pa ma yin no// mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'ang yin te/ ji ltar zos pa'i chos rnams kyang zing zing med pa'i sems kyis thob pa
252b3(dkon brtsegs): dadang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi re bar gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to// bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'byung bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to// ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar
252b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po thob bo// sems can thams cad la ni snying rje chen po skyed do// de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang srog la mi lba ba
252b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / mgu sla ba dang / so sla ba dang / dgon pa dang / bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don yongs su rtogs pa yin/
252b6(dkon brtsegs): no// don la rton pa yin te/ tshig 'bru la ni rton pa ma yin no// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par gyur pa yin no// bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi/ sems can tha
252b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi don gyi phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo// bag yod pa lhur len pa'ang yin te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po sdom pa'o//
253a1(dkon brtsegs): de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// de gzugs rnams kyi ro myong ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba'ang
253a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa jiHlta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang / snas dri rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan
253a3(dkon brtsegs): mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di ni bag yod pa
253a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa
253a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang /
253a6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma
253a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed
253b1(dkon brtsegs): ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang / rtag tu mthun pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod
253b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol tu ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te/ de'i sems nyes par spyong ba la mi 'gro'o// 'phags pa rnams
253b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do//
253b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i lam la gnas so// che ba nyid kyang 'thob po// gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas/ che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi
253b5(dkon brtsegs): sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin tu grub pa dang / bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la/
253b6(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar ldang nge ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par
253b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir shin tu btson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni dge
254a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su srung ba dang / yul 'dor ba dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang / chos
254a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dga' ba la rten pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba rnams dang tshul bzhin
254a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba
254a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa nas/ nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan
254a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des/ brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang / dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang /
254a6(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o// dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i
254a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag po su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang
254b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de'ang rab tu shes so// gang med pa de'ang med pa rab tu shes so// de la yod pa ni gang med pa ni gang zhe na/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam pa
254b2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba yod do// 'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o// de la med pa gang zhe na/ log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ de ni med pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang las dang rnam par
254b3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa ni yod do// gang las de dang rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa ni med do// gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yod do// gang mig nas
254b4(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do// le lo can la ni byang chub med do// phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga
254b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ni yod do// rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do// gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do// rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther
254b6(dkon brtsegs): zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do// de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba
254b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yod do// rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid
255a1(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de dag ni yod do// ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de
255a2(dkon brtsegs): dag med do// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis mong dang gzugs shes bya ba
255a3(dkon brtsegs): de ni yod do// rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni med do// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do// ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de
255a4(dkon brtsegs): ni med do// skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do// reg pa med na tshor ba zhes
255a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni med do// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// tshor ba med na sred pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de ni/
255a6(dkon brtsegs): med do// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do// srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni
255a7(dkon brtsegs): med do// skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do// skye ba med na rga shi dang /
255b1(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas
255b2(dkon brtsegs): dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do// thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod
255b3(dkon brtsegs): thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do// bsgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do//
255b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do// mngon pa'i ngargyal can la ni kun
255b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa brda sprong ba med do// mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do// gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// nang gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni med do//
255b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do// bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta
255b7(dkon brtsegs): na bag yod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so// 'jig rten na mkhas
256a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so// de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la'ang mi chags so// med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la'ang michas
256a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de gzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus te/ chos
256a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdo bzhir rnam par gzhag go// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams
256a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhom
256a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dpyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// gsang baba'i
256a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
256a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing
256b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur
256b2(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag
256b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ji ltar 'jig rten bskyang bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jig rten myong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces pa
256b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// grogs po dag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyongs shig/ de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spong ba
256b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma dag la mi 'phyo ba dang / chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / tha ba'i tshig med de zher
256b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'debs pa dang / tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te gzhan la mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang / gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song
256b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
257a1(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / thams cad du mthun par 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams
257a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/ grogs po dag chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs
257a3(dkon brtsegs): po dag gzhan yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems
257a4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang /
257a5(dkon brtsegs): bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin du ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa
257a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa
257a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o// rnyed pa gang
257b1(dkon brtsegs): dag chos dang mthun pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa 'am/ lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang ldan
257b2(dkon brtsegs): cig tu rnyed pa mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ongs par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang
257b3(dkon brtsegs): bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o// tshul khrims mnyams pa/ skyon med pa/ 'dren ma
257b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa/ sra sre ma yin pa/ rang dbang can/ ma 'bags pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa/ gang dag yin pa
257b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul khrims mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar
257b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / mgu bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge
257b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'o// lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal mthar
258a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta bus tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa rnams dang lhan cig tu lta ba mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos
258a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge
258a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug po ste/ grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jog rten skyong bar byed pa'i
258a4(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jig pa spangs pas 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma
258a5(dkon brtsegs): yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ grogs po dag 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di
258a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod
258a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong
258b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ gya gyu med pa ni 'jig cen slong bar byed pa ste/ grogs po dag chos gcig pu de ni 'jig rten myong bar byed pa'o// grogs po
258b2(dkon brtsegs): dag de lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten sbyong bar byed de/ grogs po dag khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas 'jig rten skyongs shig/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu
258b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
258b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba
258b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med kyi gnas su gsung sngags kyi tshig gang dag spas ded dag byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'jug
258b6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ ngas sems kyi dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
258b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan
259a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi sman sngar cog tsog pur 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// 'di lta ste/
259a2(dkon brtsegs): A hu la/ hu la ba tI/ hu la raNA/ a gu hA/ tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/ ni Shu ra nA/ kru ta kra tA/ krA ya/ krA ya/ a kra ya sa mA sha ma ma ni ka rA/ ha hu la hu ba ti/ khi la ba ti/
259a3(dkon brtsegs): kin A bi Sha ti ni sa sa ra NI/ dza dzA dza dza ma ti/ a ba tA/ ni ba tA/ brta bar+t+ta nu sA ri NI/ b+hu tA nu smai ti ho// ma nu shA nu s+thi ti ho de bA nu spr-i ti ho/ nA gA nA ma yak+Sha NA ma
259a4(dkon brtsegs): gan d+harmA NA ma/ kin nA ra NA ma/ ma ho ra ga NA mi/ sr-i stir b+ha bai tu sarba sa twA nA ma/ be ki ran du ma hA ba ra rba tA/ sam bya tha tan ha ri Na/ gardza tu sa mu dra be ga in+ti
259a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos so// sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po'ang rab tu 'khrug go// de na thams cad
259a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang 'dar pad pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par
259a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la ma reg tsam du nye bar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol/
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol// bdag cag la gnod lags so// bdag cag la rab tu gnod lags so// bdag cag 'dar bad bang lags so// bcom ldan
259b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni
259b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang / khyed kyang nam mkha' la gnas nas rab tu g.yos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
259b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ma rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams
259b5(dkon brtsegs): blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan to// bam po dgu pa// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes/ bcom ldan 'das la
259b6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i dra bas mngon par bkab nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
259b7(dkon brtsegs): kha mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang
260a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ khong khro med pa'i byams pa chen po dang / yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po
260a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / thams
260a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang / bden pa mthong ba sbyang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
260a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
260a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
260a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi sdang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems
260a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ me sdang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis brtan pa yin// ye shes
260b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin/ sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges par byung ba yin/ chos la mi rtag par
260b2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa yin/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po
260b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi sdang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
260b4(dkon brtsegs): chos du dang ldan na/ bgyi ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
260b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bani gang zhe na/ legs par bsgoms shing nyams par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgos yongs
260b6(dkon brtsegs): su bsgos pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyi rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thabs dang
260b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab las nges par byung ba yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
261a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
261a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang / skad thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad
261a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/ gzhon nu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du
261a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang /
261a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang / rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i stobs dang /
261a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs dang / sems can bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / sems can yongs su smin
261a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gzhon nu dgu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so//
261b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag bzod pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
261b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin
261b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du na 'dzam bu gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing / ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
261b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi
261b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bskul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po
261b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang / bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na bdud tshar gcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang / kha ton bya ba de dag la khyod spobs
261b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis shig/ de nas gsad pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
262a1(dkon brtsegs): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag sbas so// tad+ya thA/ hu lu/ hu lA/ hu le/ d+hI re hA rI te/
262a2(dkon brtsegs): a ku sha la kra ye/ tsa le/ tsa la ba tI/ sA re/ kU re/ krAn ti ba le/ kra me/ krAn ti ka re/ sha me/ hu lu/ a li khi/ khi ri kha re/ A be sha ni sa ra Ne/ dza ye/ dza ya ba ti/ s+thi re/
262a3(dkon brtsegs): A ba te/ bi bat+te/ A bar+ha ni/ mai tri b+hU tA nan sang gra hai/ da me/ da ma sam ban ne/ tIrni ta ra ya se/ swa yan/ sra sti de be b+h+yo/ nA ge b+h+yo/ yakle b+h+yo/ gan d+harma rakra sadz+dza/
262a4(dkon brtsegs): ma nu She a ma nu She b+h+ya swa stir b+ha ba tu sa dA su kham/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas/ ri yi rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur// chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang
262a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs// gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// phas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod// chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus// chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs// gsang sngags gzhi
262a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di zos nas ni// lha tshogs kun tu dga' gyur nas// dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos// 'khor yang rab tu 'dar
262a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// mi yi dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la// gtugs pa byas te bskyabs su dong // de dag mi 'jigs der phyin nas// ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal te// mdo 'di byin gyis
262b1(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas na// dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag bdun 'das 'das su sems camatshang
262b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag gi don mdzad nas/ zhag bdun 'das te lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la/
262b3(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar / lnga'i tshogs kyis
262b4(dkon brtsegs): ni phyag byas/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding du mas ni bskor/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
262b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod/ 'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed// rol mo sil snyan ni len/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing /
262b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen
262b7(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/ slar bya
263a1(dkon brtsegs): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byon to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to// brduzung ba dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya
263a2(dkon brtsegs): ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so// de nas
263a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang
263a4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas
263a5(dkon brtsegs): byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
263a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na 'dun khang na mchis mchis na// gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin ma
263a7(dkon brtsegs): te 'di skad ces mchi'o// yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs shes gda' 'o zhes mchis nas/
263b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ gang gi slang du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang / sem
263b2(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas/ 'di ltar gang de gzhin gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na gang
263b3(dkon brtsegs): yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa
263b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa lung bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dga' bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ de
263b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
263b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on gyis kyang ge
263b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyis/
264a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i
264a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang
264a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab
264a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
264a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla ma med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
264a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o//
264a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par ston to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom
264b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes de skad bka' stsal pa la/
264b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
264b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam du bdag bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
264b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du
264b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyis/ mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lags so// de ci'i slad
264b6(dkon brtsegs): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches bde'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byung
264b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems kyi don bgyid pa de lta de ltar bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na srad kyis ci zhig
265a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyis te/ mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yu/
265a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing sems can gyi don la brtson pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma
265a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos tshad ma mchis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod
265a4(dkon brtsegs): yul du bgyid pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni btang snyoms su lhung lags so// bcom
265a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na/ spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyis sems can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas
265a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'tshal zhing // sems
265a7(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags so// /
265b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spong yul ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa
265b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o// rgyal po chen pos de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
265b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par zhi spyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems
265b4(dkon brtsegs): dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par byas te/ rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i/ gzhan gyi spyod yul la spyad par mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
265b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa
265b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la/ kham gsum du'ang mtshams sbyor
265b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sel ba dang / sdud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang zad pa'ang
266a1(dkon brtsegs): shes la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / skye ba med par yang rab tu rtogs la/ bsam bzhin du skye ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / sems can
266a2(dkon brtsegs): yang med la/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad la dben par shes la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas
266a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du'ang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par yang shes la/ mtshan dang /
266a4(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyun
266a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gcod pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su spyod la/ don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ci bya'o cog la'ang mkhas la/ lus dang sems dben
266a6(dkon brtsegs): bar dga' ba'ang shes pa dang / chos bstan pa'ang mi 'dor la/ smra ba la smad pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar yang mi byed pa dang / ches zab mo rtogs pa'ang
266a7(dkon brtsegs): shes la/ sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'ang 'jug cing / gtam yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa dang / 'byung ba med par yang shes la/ bsams bzhin du srid pa'ang
266b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lhag mthong yang shes la/ 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
266b2(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba 'dod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba'ang shes la// sangs rgyas kyi yul la lta ba la'ang mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
266b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo// rgyal po chen po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod las ka spyod
266b4(dkon brtsegs): yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
266b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa
266b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na gnas gang lags pa dang /
266b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang / nam mkha'i spyad yul sgrib pa ma mchis pas gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
267a1(dkon brtsegs): du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper
267a2(dkon brtsegs): na gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slang du gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug gi shing ljon pa 'am/ sman gyi shing ljon pa 'am/ tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa 'am/
267a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi shing ljon pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa 'am/ spos kyi shing ljon pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las rnam par 'phel yang / nam mkha' ni de dag gis kun
267a4(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag par yang mi 'gyur/ rjes su 'chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub
267a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slo
267a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag
267a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni des mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na zhugs ni rtswa 'am/ nags tshal gang yang rung ste/ de las mi 'bros
267b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi de dag thams cad ni me smon gsal bar 'bar bar bgyid pas phan par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi me smon 'bar bar 'gyid pas/ chos thams cad na
267b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi mtshan po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi khums// dug gis mi
267b3(dkon brtsegs): stede pha rol gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyang nyan thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
267b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dris par bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson
267b5(dkon brtsegs): pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang
267b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes rab rin po che'ang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug
267b7(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas la/ dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa'ang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am/ rang gnyen
268a1(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/
268a2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de skad bstan pa na srog chags brgyad skyong gis
268a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i
268a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/
268a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu
268a6(dkon brtsegs): bgos so// de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas so// dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/
268a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gam/ 'on te yang bzhig/ gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs chen po bdog pa zhes
268b1(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam mo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so//
268b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci ba'ang yin la/ yang ba'ang yin no// smras pa/ ci'i phyir ni lci ba yin la/ ji ltar na yang ba'ang yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can nga rgyal dang /
268b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa dang / dregs pas snyems pa rnams yongs su gdul ba'i phyir lci ba yin no// sems can nga rgyal med pa dang / drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no// de nas gsang ba
268b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag lo lag na rdo rjes sa phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje sa'i steng du gzhag pa dang / de bzhag ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu
268b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/ de nas rgyal
268b6(dkon brtsegs): po ma skyes dgras tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pas rdo rje de stobs kyi shugs thams cad 'deg par bskyod na/ skra'i rtse mo cha tsam yang bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar ma nus
268b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang ya lang
269a1(dkon brtsegs): bskon pa'i glang po che'ang lag pa ya gcig gis gdeg pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul ba'i rdo'ang ma thog na/ gdeg par
269a2(dkon brtsegs): smos kyang ci 'tshal te 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lcis/ 'di la khyod yi ma 'chad cig de nas rgyal
269a3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgras/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang
269a4(dkon brtsegs): gi stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / stobs kyi shugs thams cad bstan kyang / rdo rje de bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar
269a5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe/ lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi
269a6(dkon brtsegs): shing rta dpag tshad bdun brgya pa drag tu mchi ba'ang 'dzin pa'i rngo thog na bdag gis rdo rje chung ngu 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul ba'i rngo ma thog pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs
269a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste 'di la nga'i byin gyi rlabs ma yin par rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam
269b1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lci ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ji tsam du lci ba ni dper bgyi bar yang srab ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
269b2(dkon brtsegs): ke'u shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/ ko'u shi ka gal te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi khor yug gi ri la bsnun na/ de'ang dper na phub ma sbar gang gtor ba bzhin
269b3(dkon brtsegs): du rnam par 'thor te/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di'i stobs kyi shugs ni de tsam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces
269b4(dkon brtsegs): smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig
269b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te bdag gi sa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du/ rdo rje 'di gdeg ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar
269b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de la bzung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/ chu'ang gnam du brgal
269b7(dkon brtsegs): ci ba rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
270a1(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags
270a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar dbang che bar grags la/ de ltar mthu che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung
270a3(dkon brtsegs): po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis kar sha pa Na gcig mdzub mo'i rtse mos bsgre
270a4(dkon brtsegs): bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis bsgre bzlog go// bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba mchi ba'ang bdag gis thogs par bgyid do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya gcig
270a5(dkon brtsegs): gis blangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dag 'a bod nye dga' bo de gnyis kyang btul to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams
270a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer can du'ang mchis/ bdag gis ri rab tsam gyi kha ma de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul ba'i rdo'ang ma thog pa 'di
270a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu zhu
270b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/
270b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gzhan dag gis lha spos kyang ci dgos/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar nus kyi/
270b3(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
270b4(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje ni stobs che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams na ri rab ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
270b5(dkon brtsegs): rigacig tu gyur kyang de ni gdeg par nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di ni gdeg par mi nus so// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
270b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gsang
270b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pha ma las gyur pa lags sam/ 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu pha ma las
271a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci'ang rung ste/ 'jug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par
271a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myo myo por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lha stangs kyis phyogs thams cad du kun tu gzigs te/ gsang
271a3(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdage po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i
271a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par byas nas/ sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te steng gi bar snang du 'phangs nas/ des de bar snang la lan
271a5(dkon brtsegs): bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas par gzhag go/ de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te tha la mo sbyar na sa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ltar
271a6(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bco ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur
271a7(dkon brtsegs): cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na stobs 'di lta
271b1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub
271b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lus dang srog ni yongs su gtong gi/ dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / sems can
271b3(dkon brtsegs): mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa dang / sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin
271b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya bar spro ba dang / sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
271b5(dkon brtsegs): rten la rdo thal gyis slu ba dang / sems can rnams la kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig spogs pa dang / sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba ngal ba chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/
271b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ stobs 'di lta bu 'thob bo// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa la gnas/
271b7(dkon brtsegs): shing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing / cang shes
272a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'gro bar 'gro sre/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bka' blo bde ba dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang
272a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog med pa dang / sems las su rung ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o//
272a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams
272a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa
272a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma nyes par
272a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / khyim bdag tshong dpon du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi
272a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dad pa'i rgyu mthun pa
272b1(dkon brtsegs): ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni longs smod do// gsol pa/
272b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni shes rab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun
272b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni sems can rjes su srung ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa
272b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus kyi rgyu mthun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags
272b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsam gtan gyi rgyu mthun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
272b7(dkon brtsegs): po shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos nyan pa'i
273a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa ni the tsom spong ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos yos
273a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa ni som nyi med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lagasabaka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dben par gnas pa'i
273a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun
273a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'bral ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa 'dor ba'o//
273a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni nye bar len pa med pa'o// gsol pa/
273a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o// gsol pa/
273a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po zhi ba zos pa'i rgya mthun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul bzhin yid
273b1(dkon brtsegs): la bgyid pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lpags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i la brtse ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
273b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das lus dang sems dben pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lus dang sems dben pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bam
273b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das lam gyi rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lam gyi rgyu mthun pa ni 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mos pa'i rgyu
273b4(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni rnam par gro pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung
273b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu mthun pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
273b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta bu
273b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po snying rje chen po bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba su'i legs bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
274a1(dkon brtsegs): po su dad pa skyed pa'i'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa skyed pa su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// gsol ba
274a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de su lags bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su
274a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po skyed pa ji lta
274a4(dkon brtsegs): bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji ltar sems can rnams la yongs su mi gtong ba skyed pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sems can rnams yongs su
274a5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtong ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi bde ba yongs su gtong ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba gtong ba ji lta bu lags/
274a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po su mi gtong ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba su lags/ bka' stsal pa rgyal po
274a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po su nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras
274b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par gsungs pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par bcas pa dang
274b2(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa rjes su mthun pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chab mi 'tshal ba dang / rtag pa dang chad pa ma mchis pa dang / yas dang bya
274b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa bstan pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang / mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dag ma gtogs par/ 'di ltar rgya che zhing 'di lta
274b5(dkon brtsegs): gya nom pa'i bstan pa 'di la brtson pa rnams la su zhig zlog par bgyid// gnod par bgyid/ spong bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la byas pa mi
274b6(dkon brtsegs): gzo bar mi bgyi'o// gang gi mthus bdag nyid nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis sha dang khrag gis
274b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bka' drin lan blan pa'i rngo mi thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus bdag gi bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang / chos snang ba chen po thob par bgyis
275a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang bdag gis lan dran pa'i rngo mo thog lags so// tshangs pa'i snod pa 'di mthal
275a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o// ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi
275a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa gnyis pa'o// / bam po bcu pa ste tha ma'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo zos kyis/ gsang ba pa'i
275a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam lag na rdo rjes smras
275a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di kho bo'i dbang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig sprul na/ kho bo'i
275a6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa gzugs tha dad pa rnam par rtsen pa tha dad pa'ang de snyed de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de nas byang chub
275a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
275b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos zlas
275b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis bsras zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bskrad pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma skyes pa/
275b3(dkon brtsegs): zad par mi 'gyur ba/ nub par mi 'gyur ba'o// yi ge gang dag gis don gang brjod pa'i don de'ang nub par bya bar mi nus pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i ches ni nu
275b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la skye ba ci'ang med do// gang skye ba med pa de mi 'gag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung
275b5(dkon brtsegs): yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin 'di ni 'dug pa nyid do zhes gsungs te/ de ltar na
275b6(dkon brtsegs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal yin no// gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba de dam pa'i chos yin no// dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de rtag par mi nub ste/ des
275b7(dkon brtsegs): na dam pa'i chos shes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i dag po gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag gang du go cha gyon/ smras pa/ gang
276a1(dkon brtsegs): dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag ni/ chos thams cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams
276a2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang mi 'gal ba de nyid dam pa'i chos so// smras pa/ ji ltar na chos dang 'gal ba gang yin/ smras pa/ yi ge dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/ chos dang ni nam yang 'gal
276a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro// de la gang dag mi 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i
276a4(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de na stong pa
276a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / bdag gir smra ba yin la/ de ni mi rtag pa dang /
276a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang / bdag gi med par smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten
276a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la/ de ni rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro ba des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni tshe 'di lhur len pa yin la/ de ni tshe rabs 'pho ba lhur len
276b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni chos thams cad la mngon pa na
276b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis na gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i
276b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin to// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin ta ma/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bdag yongs su mi 'dzin/ sems
276b4(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su mi 'dzin/ chos yongs su mi 'dzin to// smras pa/ ji ltar yongs su mi 'dzin/ smras pa/ bdag dben pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang /
276b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / sems can dang / chos dben pa ma yin pa dang / 'das pa dben pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba dben pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
276b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa dang / sangs rgyas dben
276b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa dang / zhing dben pa dang / zhing dben pa ma yin pa dang / chos dben pa ma yin par gang de ltar chos rnams rjes su rtogs pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dri
277a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// 'di ni dam pa'i
277a2(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang // gang chos thams
277a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la mtshan ma dang spros par mi 'dzin pa dang / kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyas
277a4(dkon brtsegs): po bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' lags so// bcom
277a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/ nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de la gang dag dmigs pa thams cad
277a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye bar zhi ba lags te/ de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags/ mched pa ma lags/ 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lags so// gang dag zhi ba dang / rab tu ni
277a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nye bar zhi bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba de ltar 'dzin to// lha'i bu des de skad
277b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas/ dge slong stong ni sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ lha'i chu
277b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu spobs pa 'di su'i yin/ smras pa/ spobs pa 'di su bag chags thams cad spangs pa dang / tshig gi lam thams cad med pa
277b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / don dam par brjod du med pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yin no// smras pa/ lha'i bu spobs pa ji ltar skye/ smras pa/ spobs pa med pa dang / spobs pa ma yin
277b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i tshig go// spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spobs pa med pa'i tshig go// rigs kyi bu
277b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la/ 'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa
277b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su dmigs pa la'ang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la'ang mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su chos thams
277b7(dkon brtsegs): cad la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de shes pas chos gang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su gnas med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med pa dang /
278a1(dkon brtsegs): chu bo las brgal ba de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni skye ba med pa las skyes pa dang 'gog pa'ang med la/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i spobs pa'o//
278a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//
278a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
278a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyan par 'dod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba nas 'dir 'ongs so// zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po
278a5(dkon brtsegs): bzang 'dis chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/ de 'dod na bskal pa brgya stong du thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas bstan kyang / 'di'i spobs pa zad par
278a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzang gi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad
278a7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi rnam
278b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni gang yi ge rnams la yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ste// zhi ba'i b+h+rUM gros chos thams cad nI a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni a nas
278b2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i sgo'o// a zhes bya ba las byung ba'o// a zhes bya ba'i mtha' 'o// a zhes bya ba ni tshig gi las thams cad kyi las byed do// a zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'o// rnam par mi shes pa'o//
278b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs shes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros rjes su 'jug pa ni de la chos phra rab tsam lang
278b4(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa med pa dang 'byung ba med pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge de dag ni gzhig nas lhags nas khong pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do// yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin no//
278b5(dkon brtsegs): gau de dag ni byung nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung ma smras kyang rung ste/ zad par 'gyur ba 'am/
278b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni chos shes 'am/ chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog go// yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa 'am/ bkag pa med do// yi ge de dag
278b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sus kyang byas pa 'am/ chud gsan pa med ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge grang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba'ang de bzhin no// sems bzang ba ji lta bar chos thams cad bgrang ba'ang de
279a1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa'ang de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te/ bgrang ba med pa ni chos bgra
279a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// ji ltar chos bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du/ a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'ang de lta bu ste/ gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa/ skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o//
279a3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do// de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs pa rgyun gan
279a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so// des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su rtogs so// de ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag rjod
279a5(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon du 'gyur ro// de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug go// sems can gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du ches
279a6(dkon brtsegs): ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi dri ma med pa yin no// bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no// sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no// lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du
279a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa yin no// bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no// shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no// dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no// bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa
279b1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyis mi 'dus pa yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba yin no// phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// lus kyis stobs dang ldan pa yin/
279b2(dkon brtsegs): mo sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no// spobs pas mi zad pa yin no// bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no// nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no// ye shes kyis chags pa
