363b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams gser gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnam dngul gyi rang bzhin// ya lag rnams bai b+huR+Ya'i rang bzhin lo ma rnams shel gyi rang
364a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams spug gi rang bzhin me tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon
364a2(dkon brtsegs): pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams dbur gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin yal ga rnams shel gyi rang bzhin lo ma rnams sdug gi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i
364a3(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin 'bras bu rnams gser gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams shel gyi rang
364a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin payal ga rnams sdug gi rang bzhin lo ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang
364a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsal rnams shel gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams sdug gi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang
364a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ me tog rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams bai DUrma'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams sdug gi rang bzhin
364a7(dkon brtsegs): la/ sdong po rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin yal ga rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin me tog rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang
364b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams gser gyi
364b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin lo ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams be DUR+Wa'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams sdug gi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa la
364b3(dkon brtsegs): cig ni rtsa ba rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams shel gyi rang bzhin
364b4(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams kyang rin po
364b5(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yal ga rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin 'dab ma rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ me tog
364b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang rin po sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' dga' bo shing ljon pa de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga
364b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ni 'jam pa/ reg na bde ba/ dri zhim pa dag go// rlung gis bskyod na de dag las snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sbyar te/
365a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa dang mthun zhing mnyan pas chog mi shes pa'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gyis gang ste/ mtha' ni rin
365a2(dkon brtsegs): bo che sna bdun gyi chu shing gi sdong po dang / rin po che'i shing ta la'i 'phreng gis yongs su bskor to// thams cad kyang gser gyi dra bas khebs pa'o// kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi badra rnams kyis le
365a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de na pad+ma'i tshe dpag tshad phye tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga'i tshad tsam yang yod
365a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bcu'i bar gyi tshad tsam dag kyang yod do// rin po che'i pad+ma thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas
365a5(dkon brtsegs): kyai sku gser gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ste/ de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med bdag tu
365a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nas sems can rnamos la chos ston to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad bgrangs
365a7(dkon brtsegs): med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri nag po rnams ye med de/ ri thams cad kyang rin po che'i ri sha
365b1(dkon brtsegs): stag go// ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad dang / khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yus chen po thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun tu mnyam pa/ rnams
365b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
365b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha'i rab kyi ngos la gnas pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
365b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gong ma 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang /
365b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lharnam gang na gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du bgyir pa bsam gyis
365b6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rnyed par rung gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
365b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams kyi dge ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sus kyang mtha' 'am/ tshad rtogs pa 'am/ bsam par mi nus te/ gnan du na sangs rgyas kyi yul
366a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ltar sems can bsod nas byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul dang /
366a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de la dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom ma mchis te/ bdag nA~M ma 'ongs pa'i
366a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyi dogs pa dang yid gnyis dang bcom bsal ba'i sbrang du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su nu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
366a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa kun dga' bo legs so legs so// de lta bun khyod kyi bya ba yin no// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan den chu klung rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bab ste/ de klu
366a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po kha tshon dpag tshad tsam dag kyang yod/ dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / gzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'i bar dang / kha tshon dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad tsam dag kyang yod de/ thabs
366a6(dkon brtsegs): su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis bdag go// rgya klung de dag thams cad kyang spos ni rab tu nim pa sna tshogs kyi chur babab cing / rin po che'i me tog sil ma'i tshogs dang 'bab pa dag go/ sgra dbyangs
366a7(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag go// kun dga' bo chu grung chen po de dag las lha'i grub dbyangs yan lag bya ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sol snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis/
366b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bas lhag pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ chu klung chen po de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang / kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
366b2(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / rna bar bde ba dang / snying du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / mnyan pa dang mthun
366b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mnyan na bde ba ste/ de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grag go// kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag gi 'gram gnyis ni
366b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i spos kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang ste/ de dag la yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / dog pa sna tshogs 'phyang ngo // de na sems can gang dag chu klung gi 'gram de dag tu
366b5(dkon brtsegs): zang zing med pa lha'i dga' ba dang rtse ba myong bar 'dod pa de dag chu klung de dag tu 'jug pa'i tshe/ 'dod na chu long bu nub tsam du gnas so// 'dod na pus mo nub tsam dang / 'dod na rked pa nub tsam dang / 'dod/
366b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan kung nub tsam dang / 'dor na med pa nub tsam du chu gnas par gyur te/ lha'i dga' ba dag kyang 'byung ngo // der sems can gang dag chu grang bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na'ang de dag la bsil bar
366b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gang dag dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod nabang de dag la dro bar 'gyur ro// gang dag bsil ba dang dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na'ang / de dag la chu de bsil ba dang dro bar 'gyur te de bar gyu'o//
367a1(dkon brtsegs): chu klung chen po de dag ni lha'i shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a karu rung / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / rgya spos dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / spos mchog gis
367a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgos pa'i chus yongs su gang ste/ 'bab pa lha'i me tog u t+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ni rab tu tshim pa dag gi me tog gis khebs// khol khol dkun bya ngang ba dang / na
367a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka rand pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang rma bya la sogs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ de
367a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya'o tshogs kyis bsten pa/ ngang pa dang ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa dang / 'babs stegs bde ba/ 'dam rdzab med pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba
367a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag go/ de na gang gi tshe sems can de dag bdag cag gi bsam pa 'di 'dra ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa de lta bu dag chos dang ldan par yongs su rdzogs par
367a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo chu de las yid 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la go bar byed do// de na sems can gang dag chu ngogs na 'khod pa
367a7(dkon brtsegs): dag sgra 'di bdag cag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags par ma gyur cig ces 'dod na/ dede dag gi lha'i rna ba'i dbang po la grag par mi 'gyur ro// gang sgra rnam pa ji lta bu thos par 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra
367b1(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba thos so// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang /
367b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
367b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams
367b4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / dbang du bskur ba'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sgra dag thos so// de sgra
367b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob bo// dben pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang ldan pa
367b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos dang ldan pa dang / byang chub yongs su 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na mi dge ba'i ming yong med do// sgrib pa'i
367b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra yong med do// ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra'ang yong med do// sdug bsngal gyi sgra'ang yang med do// kun dga' bo den sdug bsngal yang ma yin// pade ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba/
368a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra'ang med na/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra lha ga la yod/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ste/ nus par na
368a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par byed na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa zang zar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod kyang / bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs
368a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi nus so// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang /
368a4(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang / chu zheng dang / dbang dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs
368a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu/
368a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan te/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems can dag kham gyis za bar rags pa'i kha zas mi za'o// kha zas
368a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'byor pa nyid du shes te/ lus tshim par 'gyur/ gzugs tshim par 'gyur ro// de dag yang lus la 'jug par mi byed do// de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam
368b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bdugs par 'gyur ro// de na gang dri de la sdom par mi 'dod pa de la smos dra'i 'du shes dang bsgos btsam yang
368b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar gang dag spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnab pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag gi
368b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur ro// de dag gos kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog bcu stong du ma ci 'dra ba 'dod pa de lta bu gos rin po che dag gis sangs
368b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur zhing / lus la bgos par bdag nyid kyis shes so// de dag 'di lta ste/ mgo'i rgyan nas/ rna ba'i rgyan nam/ mgul pa dang / lag pa dang /
368b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste/ cod pan dang / rna cha dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / sor gang dang / gser gyi tsong tshong dang / ska rags dang /
368b6(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che brgya stong du mas spras pa dag 'di lta ste/ rin po
368b7(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa la 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang bar mthong ste/ rgyan de dag gis bdag brgyan par yang shes so// de dag gang kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng gi bar dang / rin po
369a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi bag ma brgya stong gi sa brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ sngas khra bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang ji lta bu
369a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang de dag gi mdun du 'byung ste/ de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang grub pa de dag gi nang na lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas
369a3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khod de/ rtse zhing dgra la dga' mgur spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi rnams tha dad pa med de/ gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis lha dang mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni ma
369a4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs so// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na mi mar bas dang mi za ma ni lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin zhing / mi 'jigs pa ma yin la/ 'od gsal
369a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste/ skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / dbang dang /
369a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / dbang phyug gis lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma gtogs so//
369a7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
369b1(dkon brtsegs): can de na/ snga dro'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ phyogs pa ni kun nas 'khrugs shing / kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste/ de dag gis rin po che'i shing sngon pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa kha dog tha pa/
369b2(dkon brtsegs): kha dog du ma lod pa/ lha'i spros dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa de dag bskyod/ kun tu bskyod/ bskul kun tu bskul nas/ de dag las me tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsu /
369b3(dkon brtsegs): blta na sdug pa dag rin po che ba sa chen po de la 'brul ste/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun srid du bkram par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu sa la me tog 'gram
369b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa zhig gis lag pa gnyis kas bkram ste/ mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing blta na sdug go// de bzhin du me tog bsung dang kha dog tha dad pa dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
369b5(dkon brtsegs): de kun tu mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro// me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste/ dpe tsam du na gos ka tsa lir da ltar reg na bde ba'o// de dag gi rkang pa 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam
369b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing / rkang pa bteg pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro// snga dro'i dus 'das nas ni me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
369b7(dkon brtsegs): de dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur zhing me tog snga ma rnams kyis brnyogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyogs bzhi kun nas rlung langs te/ gang sngon
370a1(dkon brtsegs): ma byung ba'i me tog gsar pa dag mngon par 'thor ro// snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang / byi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang / mtshan mo'ang srod dang / nam gyi gung dang / zo rangs kyang
370a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// spos ni sna tshogs kyis bskos pa'i rlung dag langs nas/ sems can dadag la gan 'di sa ste/ dper nadage slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu'i bde bdang ldan par 'gyur
370a3(dkon brtsegs): ro// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhini gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par me dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang /
370a4(dkon brtsegs): mun pa mun nag gi ming dug dgas pa yong med do// nyin mo dang mtshan mor btags pa'ang yong med de/ khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong med do// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde
370a5(dkon brtsegs): ba can de na dus su lha'i spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i me tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gdug
370a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi chur mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i tha re dag kyang 'dzin to// lha'i rin po che'i gdugs dra nga'i bsil ya ba dang bcas pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'dzin to// g+ha'i/
370a7(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang sgrogs shing / lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi ning der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams
370b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ ma nges pa dang log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par gzhag pa dam/ gdags pa
370b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par bstan na ni bskal ba zang zad du 'jig
370b3(dkon brtsegs): ten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongs su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de nas tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
370b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la// dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste// de dag bskal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// deng ba can gyi bsngags pa rab rjod
370b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu brjod pa nA/ bskal pa bye ba de dag zad 'gyur gyi/ bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar mi phyin// de dag spobs pa'ang zad par 'gyur ma yin// gang
370b6(dkon brtsegs): gi sa phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur pa// de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa ni// gang gis da
370b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang // bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags rnams// thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di yi char yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa
371a1(dkon brtsegs): de yi// yon tan thos nas mthu dang dang skyeng la/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos badrag po skyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
371a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni// zhing mchog thag gru chen po de dag kun// cha dang dpe yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can// de dag de bas bsod nams
371a3(dkon brtsegs): mang du 'gyur/ don dam thob phyir dang brtsa ba ste// de lta bas na thos nas yod gnyis sol// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med
371a4(dkon brtsegs): ro// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgra bcom
371a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su rjod do// bsngags pa gsung ngo // grags pa rab tu sgrogs so// yon tan rjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
371a6(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa zag pa nas dang ba dang ldan pas sred pa de dag thams ca/
371a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag kha cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang / dge
371b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba mang po dngag tu med pa bsgreng ba dang / byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams deng skye bar sngon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pan/ dbanin
371b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de/ dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis
371b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
371b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dngag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la
371b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag
371b6(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhim gshegs pa de'ang yid la byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtong ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa
371b7(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng dang / zhabs 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de
372a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / brjed pa med pa'i
372a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pas shing bos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing
372a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar yang 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag 'chang pa na dga' ba 'thob cing spyir lug pa med la/ mi 'god mi num cig tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
372a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag med de yid la byed de/ 'dod pa'ang skyed na de dag rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
372a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/
372a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang yongs su rjod/ bsngags pa'ang gsung / bstod pa'ang sgrogs so// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
372a7(dkon brtsegs): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgade bzhin gshegs pa pod dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs de dang /
372b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi nang gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bur su tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid
372b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes par gsung zhing tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la/ phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing // mtha' yas gang+gA'i klung gi
372b3(dkon brtsegs): snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lnga dang mis mchod pa// mi yi
372b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang / byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa
372b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag lhags// de dag spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems dpa'
372b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po de dag gis// mchod pa byas te dpag med 'od zhabs la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes shes 'dzer// dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems ni
372b7(dkon brtsegs): gnal yas kyis// de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor nas// 'dren pa de yi spyan sngar 'di skad du/ bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur ces smras// de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag
373a1(dkon brtsegs): de tshe dpag tshad brgya pa'i gdugs gyur te// legs par brgyan cing yu ba bkrabs mdzes// sangs rgyas sku la kun tu khebs par gnas// byang chub sems dpa' da dag /
373a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ bsnyen bkur byas nas dga' ste 'di skad du// gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs rnyed 'dzer/ sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na//
373a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed// bskal pa stong du ston pas gang bskyabs pa// rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni ci 'dra ltos// 'od ni dpag med gzi brjid dpag med pa// sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun
373a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag med pa// byang chub sems dpas bskor cing mdzes gyur pa/ sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po mchog la ltos// de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas// 'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum
373a5(dkon brtsegs): nu drug/ de dag zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ zhing stong bye ba dag ni khyad par mdzad// 'od 'phro de dag thams cad slar log ste/ 'dren pa'i spyi gtsug der ni nub par gyur// re tshe
373a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od 'gro nus par gyur nas ni// lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed// de nas sangs rgyas sras po grags chen po// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de ladus te// gang srad 'jig rten mgon pa
373a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad pa/ bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags// sems can mang 'grel phan pa thugs brtse can// don dam mkhas pa de ni lung bstan gsol// gsung mchog yid du mchi ba de thos
373b1(dkon brtsegs): nas// sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang byang chub sems dpa' dag/ sangs rgyas blta smad bde can 'dir mchig// de dag thos nas dga' ba mar bskyed de//
373b2(dkon brtsegs): myur du zhing 'di rnam par lta bar 'gyur// rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags par gyur nas kyang / lha yaM mig dang lha yi rna ba dang / tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur
373b3(dkon brtsegs): du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa// ras ni sngon tshe smon 'am 'di skad btab// sems can dag gis nga yi ming thos na// nga yi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog nga yi smon
373b4(dkon brtsegs): lam bzang po de rdzogs pas// 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'ong // de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir//
373b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi zhing yang 'di 'drar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang // sems can mang po sgrol bar bya 'dod pa// de ni myur du rings par la gor du// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten la/
373b6(dkon brtsegs): song la// 'od dpag med kyi gan du son nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod bgyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis zhing mang sen nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la mchod byas te// bde bar
373b7(dkon brtsegs): gshes la mchod pa byas nas kyang // dro khar bde ba can du slar yang 'ong // bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa
374a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'bang du dpag tshad stong drug brgya phong pa/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dpag tshad brgyad brgya
374a2(dkon brtsegs): tshur chad du 'phyang ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ rtag tu lo ma chags pa/ rtag tu me tog chags pa/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong
374a3(dkon brtsegs): du ma yod pa/ lo ma tha dad pa/ me tog tha dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba lta bur snar ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor
374a4(dkon brtsegs): bu rin po ches rnam par spras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gis shin tu rnam par sbas pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa/ gser gyi skud pa 'byang
374a5(dkon brtsegs): ba se mo do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / ro shal tshig rgyan dang / mu tig dmar po'i rgyan 'breng dang / mu tig sngon po'i rgyan 'breng dang / seng ge'i kha nas
374a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin po che thams cad dang / dung gis mngon par sbas pa/ gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad
374a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bla rer zos pa/ chu srin dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'byil ba dang / zla gam lta bus legs par brgyan pa/ nor bu 'khrol ba dang / gser
374b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can gyi ba sam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub kyi shing de rlung gis bskyod na sa/
374b2(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med bgo bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i
374b3(dkon brtsegs): ru rna nad kyis ma btab par shes par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa gang dag
374b4(dkon brtsegs): gi mo ga lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang
374b5(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lcend kyis mi
374b6(dkon brtsegs): btab par shes par bya'o// byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyad par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o//
374b7(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yeng bar shes par bya'o// sems
375a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
375a2(dkon brtsegs): med de nyid kyi sngor gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sngon lam dang spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang / shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mi nyung
375a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta ste/ sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems
375a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
375a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ go cha rgya chen po bgos pa sems
375a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing den nyan thos gang dag 'khor pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang ba sha stag go/
375a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor pa de dag ni bod dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug
375b1(dkon brtsegs): tu snang bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
375b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyi ming ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de gnyis las gcig gi ming ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
375b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// gcig gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes so//
375b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus yongs su rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan
375b5(dkon brtsegs): dang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ dbang po rno ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ ma zhum pa/ dbang po mig yog
375b6(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa sha stag go// kun dgang po byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ning der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral
375b7(dkon brtsegs): ga byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas/ nam yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur gyi/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/
376a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dper na da ltar gyi bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus na/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas dkrugs pa dag
376a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga drogacig bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
376a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag tu dong nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
376a4(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod pa bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems skyed cing / ji snyed 'dod pa rnams de dag
376a5(dkon brtsegs): gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog nas rol mo'i dbyings sgra'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas
376a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang skyed cing sogs so// gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu lag pa nas byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na'ang /
376a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ dri tha dad pa/ dri ru ma yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas byung ste/ de dag gos skon du'i me tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
376b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag la 'thoramangon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ro// skon bu'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las nang gi chung ngu ga pa yin pa de'ang steng dazhi bar snang la dpag chad bcu'i tshad tsan gyi me
376b2(dkon brtsegs): tog gi gdugs su 'gyur te/ phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar du snga mas la mi ltung ngo // de na skon bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba'ang yod/
376b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad sum nu dang bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yong / steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de na gang dag dga' ba dang
376b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyed cing sems dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs me ba dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po
376b5(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la slar log nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dngag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
376b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zin pa dang / sngon chos mnyan pa byin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam 'byor cing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / shin tu rnam
376b7(dkon brtsegs): par phye ba dang / shin tu bsgoms pas smon lam btab pa grub bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ thams
377a1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' yang mi skyed do// de dag thams
377a2(dkon brtsegs): zad sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba mi skyed do// 'gro ngana'ang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i/ ltos pa dang bcas par ma yin no// 'di lta ste
377a3(dkon brtsegs): dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gnas kyi sems dang / sems de lta bu dag de dag la yod med do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes
377a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi 'du shes med/ 'thab pa med/ rtsod pa med/ mi mthun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med do//
377a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang 'jam pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems
377a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rab tu dang nga'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / spong ba med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang shes rab kyi
377a7(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i sems dang / sems kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la mo rab tu zhugs pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho chen po dang mnyam pa/ blo ra rab dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan
377b1(dkon brtsegs): du ma bsags pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag yang dag par 'gro bas rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ lha
377b2(dkon brtsegs): myig mngon par bsgrub pa/ shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa/ chos kyi mig gi pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrub cing 'chad de ston la/ rgya cher yang dag par ra tu
377b3(dkon brtsegs): ston cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa/ khams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa/ sems rul ba/ soms zhi ba/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan
377b4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ gsal ba dang mi bsal ba la mangs pa/ tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa
377b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lta bar gnas pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnams kyis snying po rtogs pa/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
377b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ci'i'ang med pa/ len pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ phung po med pa/ len pa med pas shin tu rnam par grol ba/
377b7(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med pa la gnas pa/ sems chags pa med pa/ zhum pa med pa /
378a1(dkon brtsegs): chos zang mo rnams la mngon par brtson pa/ snying lug pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas 'phags pa/ 'dod pa gcig pu'i lam
378a2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thob pa/ the tsom med pa/ dogs pa las rgal ba shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa lhag pa'i nga rgya med pa ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te ri rab
378a3(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pa/ 'jug pa med pa'i tshe rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba/ shes rab kyi 'od dang dkar ning shin tu dkapa 'dag cing dge ba'i sems dang gsar bcoma'i kha dog dang 'dra ba sdang
378a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gis nyi zla'i 'od las shin tu 'das pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba bzod pas sa dang mtshungs pa nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar
378a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la rloms sems su byed pa dang nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i phyir me'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba/
378a6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad nges par phigs pa dang thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i phyir pad+ma dang 'dra ba chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon
378a7(dkon brtsegs): par sgrogs pas dus kyi rjes su babrang ba'i 'brug chen po dang mtshungs pa/ chos kyi nu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char pa chen po dang 'dra ba tshogs chen po zil gyi gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshus
378b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sems shin tu dul bas glang po chen po dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dul bas rtswa cang shas bzang po dang mtshungs pa/ rtsal dang mi 'jigs pas skrag pa med du'i phyir ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge dang
378b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob sa shing gi rgyal po n+ya gro d+ha dang mtshungs pa phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g.yos pas ri'i rgyal po ri rang dang 'dra ba/ byams pa tshad
378b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsgoms pas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ gnas su sogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa/
378b4(dkon brtsegs): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ 'byung bar dka' ba'i phyir u dum wa ra'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ rgya mtsho ltar shin tu mnyams par
378b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pa/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa/ dbang po rmug pa med pa/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa/ bzod pa rang nges pa mang ba pha rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas drag
378b6(dkon brtsegs): dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa/ chos yongs su tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba/ tshul khrims kyis bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra ba/ thos pas rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang tsu
378b7(dkon brtsegs): pa chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sla snyan pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po rdung ba/ chos kyi dung chen po 'jud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgred pa/ chos kyi bdan chen po 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sngon mchen po sa/
379a1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar bar byed pa/ shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba/ rmongs pa med pa/ zhe sdang med pa/ tha bab tu la ba pa dag pa/ dring ba med pa/ brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par/
379a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed pa la dga' ba gtong ba btang ba/ sbyin pa la lag brkyang ba chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba/ sbyin pa la ser sna med pa'adres pa med pa/ ling 'jigs pa med pa/
379a3(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa/ brtan pa/ dpa' ba/ gces par 'dzin pa mos pa dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zug rngu phyung ba/ gtan pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ des pa/
379a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs na bde ba/ don byed pa/ 'jig rten gsal bar byed pa/ 'dren pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa/ dag pa/ mya ngan dang bral ba/
379a5(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ mngon par shes pa rnam par rtsen pa/ rgyu'i stobs can smon lam gyi stobs can/ mi dman pa gya gyu med pa sangs rgyas phye
379a6(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig dargya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ nga rgyal gyi zug rngu bton pa / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba/ dag pa dge ba la mos pa rgyal
379a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dam pas bsngags pa/ 'jig rten mkhas pa/ sbyangs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ rgyal bas bstod pa/ sems dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rtul bod pa/ sran thub
379b1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa/ 'dus pa/ rgya che ba/ khyu mchos tu gyur pa/ bden pa sprub/ thod du ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa to/
379b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can/ bsod nams dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ tha ba dang / dri ma dang / khaMng khro ba dang thal ba/ chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos
379b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo mdor bsdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bung bsgrub go// rgyas par byan gal te de bzhin
379b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas bstan kyang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan par mi nus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'dzugs pa 'argyun
379b5(dkon brtsegs): chad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir ne na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis
379b6(dkon brtsegs): ka'ang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo longs la nub phyogs su phyogs te/ me tog gtor la thal mo sbyar te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
379b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rdul med cing rnam par dag par bzhugs shing 'tsho la ga zhes shing chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag tshol cig/ de'i mtshan de'ang sgrib pa med pa/
380a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur grags te phyogs re re ma'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung chags pa mi mnga' zhing gsung thogs pa mi mnga' ba ga ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lan 'ga' la/
380a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' ma yin par bsngags pa brjod cing bstod de snyan pa gsung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// com
380a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dang / tshe dpag med de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig
380a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta 'tshal lo// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di spras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
380a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ngo // de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba brgya stong thams cad na rinag po 'am/ rin por
380a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe'i ri 'am/ lhun po 'am/ lhun po chen po 'am/ btang zung ngam/ btang zung chen po 'am/ khor yug gam/ khor yug chen po 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ka ba 'am/ shing ljon pa stug po 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/
380a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang ngam/ lha dang mi gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis thal bar gyur cing / zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar nas
380b1(dkon brtsegs): mi zhig 'dom gang tsam na 'dug pa la 'i zhig sa pa de bzhin du/ ro'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang 'od yongs su dag par phyir/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / ras bsnyen dang / dge snyen sa
380b2(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dring za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / maM dang / mi ma yin padag sangs rgyas kyi nang 'di
380b3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal po'i ring ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil
380b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang der mdzes pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po de la lta'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig tu gyur na/ de la shing
380b5(dkon brtsegs): ljon pa rnams med/ ri rnams med/ gling rnams med/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams med/ chu klung rnams med cing / ngam grog dang g.yangs rnams mi snang ste/ gzhan du nas chen po
380b6(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon par grub pa'i 'od 'dos gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od dngag tshad bye ba brgya stong
380b7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtag sa ma mtshan ma cung zad kyang med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des/ nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang
381a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan nas/ phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun tu sdang ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos/
381a2(dkon brtsegs): rang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang mi de dag thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor cing chos ston pa'ang
381a3(dkon brtsegs): snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa la bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyar bkod pa phun
381a4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa 'di dang / steng gi bar snang la kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' bdag dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / chu klung dang rdzing du nyams dga' ba dag dang / rin
381a5(dkon brtsegs): po che'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu dadang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dag dang / 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng bas kun tu
381a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas pa dang / ri 'i sna tshogs kyi ka ba'i 'greng bas gang ba dang / de bzhin bshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis bsnyen pa mthong dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong 'gro /
381a7(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgras go bar byed cing / des byang chub sems dpa' bdag rtag tu
381b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs na
381b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gan la med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa dag tu zhugs te/ bar snang la chags pa med par 'gro ba dag kyang mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
381b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnams tha dad du bya ba long dag gsol pa/
381b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
381b5(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'thab
381b6(dkon brtsegs): zal gyi lha rnams gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa 'am/ rapag tshad rgya ba 'am/ rapag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur sbyor pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
381b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde can de'i mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas par mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ma sems can rdzus te 'byung ba gang dag pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas te
382a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kha cig pad+ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang / kha cig dad+hA la skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ba 'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/
382a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maM pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te/ thethom du ltung ba'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i
382a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so// gang dag the tsom med cing som ni chad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed la/ sa
382a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing dang la mos pa de dag ni pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ngo // mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa'
382a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyenas tu
382a6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar sems skyed cing / the tsom mi skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la som nyi med cing rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang sogs pa de dag ni skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de lta/
382a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas ring po ma lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// mi pham pa shes rab kyi khyad par dang shes rab tu
382b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dang / 'an ste bcob du sbyang ba'i 'dugs yid la byud byas 'di sar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthang ba las yongs suthams pang+gA byang chub sems dpa' sa
382b2(dkon brtsegs): dang sa nyan pa dang / gta dang / ge ra'i spyod pa dang bsun su mchags pa tham sa mas pa dang shes rang chung ba la
382b3(dkon brtsegs): phab pa 'di lta ste/ dper dargyal po rnal rigs spyo bo nas dbang bskur ba la khri mags dang bai rgyu thams cad kyis smras pa/ dang dang / 'breng ba dang
382b4(dkon brtsegs): chogs cho snga chags kyim bris pa/ sa bcos bu sa na ni sa mas ts+tsha tshogs pazlas pa'adug pa cu che sa 'dusasmra / khang
382b5(dkon brtsegs): ya dang skar ba dang 9 tu bas dang lag mngon po che tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gser da rin po che'i dril bu ga par
382b6(dkon brtsegs): sa na she na hA/ mags pa bcas pa ni/ 'as/ sa ban ni myeng rdum rdzu
382b7(dkon brtsegs): chus 'i phru mas rgya na 'ams ma sa las ma kyicig
383a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yon gnyis su rten ma dmar po bzhag pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa de la de 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / de'i zas skom gtsang ma bsod pa rnam pa mang po dum ba shams na/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam
383a2(dkon brtsegs): sems/ rgyal po'i bu de'i yongs su srung ba rgya che ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ga mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ des de'i ro myang bar byed dam/
383a3(dkon brtsegs): med par byed ram/ des dga' ba 'thob pa ma gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te nongs pa gang gi slad du rgyal pos khri mon der stsal ba de las thar bar 'tshal zhing
383a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs bzang po rigs bzang po'i gzhon ru dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ gang gi sa khri mon de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba yongs su tshol
383a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de brtson ra de na dga' ba ma ches shing / rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du mi thar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
383a6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag the tsom du lhung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang / sems dang ba tsam des
383a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skye'ang pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas shing rdzus te 'byung ba ma yin gyi pad+ma rnams kyi mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la skyed mos tshal dang gnal med khang du 'du shes
383b1(dkon brtsegs): shing gnas te/ kha sha ga ci med/ mchil ba dang skabs med/ yid dang mo mthun pa mi 'byung mod kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang
383b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam rnam par nges pa dang / dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de dag ren mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi ga sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag pad+ma'i mang
383b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams nas 'byung ste/ de dag de nas byung yang steng ngam/ 'og gam/ thar kar byung ba mi shes so// mi dam pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
383b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tsom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrubs par
383b5(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa la ltos/ mi pham pa the tsom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos/ mi pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tsom yongs su spangs te/
383b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
383b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
384a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
384a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas nas ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi bam pa byang chub sems dpa'
384a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mab po la dge ba'i
384a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams lha smos kyang ci dgos// de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
384a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gan nas byang chub sems
384a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba phrag dgu ba cu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
384a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i'ajig rten sbon ma'i gnanas/ byang
384b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug nu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa klu zil gyis gnod pa'i gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' byed zag drug cu rtsa ba ni 'jig rten
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'od kyi gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
384b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa seng ge'i gon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phye
384b4(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig phrag brgyang cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag gu 'jig rten gyi khams
384b5(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal
384b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa/ 'jug pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa/ nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor
384b7(dkon brtsegs): ba bsnyil ba/ bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi
385a1(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rabal
385a2(dkon brtsegs): med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi pham pa rnam grangs de lta
385a3(dkon brtsegs): bus de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen
385a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang mtha' rtogs pa mi nus so// mi pham pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
385a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag rnyed pa ji snyed cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la tha na sems
385a6(dkon brtsegs): dad pa gcig tsam rnyed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa mi byed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro// mi pham pa de lta bas na khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud bar bya ste/ lha dang
385a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba
385b1(dkon brtsegs): da daklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / bsgom pa la mngon par dga' par bya'o// mi lam pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin
385b2(dkon brtsegs): zhag gcig tsam yang bzung zhing bcangs te/ bklags shing kun chub par byas la/ bsam pa thag pa nas gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// tha na glegs bam la legs
385b3(dkon brtsegs): bar bris te bcang bar bya zhing / de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o// gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la
385b4(dkon brtsegs): dgod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de la blta ba dang / bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su
385b5(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las brgyal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang g.yor ma
385b6(dkon brtsegs): lhung ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su dga' bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus
385b7(dkon brtsegs): rlabs po che chen po brtsam par bya'o// tha na pa gcig 'jos pa de srid du'ang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o// stong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba de brgal nas kyang 'gyod pa
386a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ mi rim pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig zug du ma gachos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu
386a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di mnyan cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu/
386a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur du
386a4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa shin tu legs par rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
386a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
386a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang bsgom pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / tha na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/
386a7(dkon brtsegs): de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no// mi dam pa de ltar nangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa yin te/ khyod kyang de the tsom med par brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing
386b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa med pa la som nyi ma pazhig/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i btson rang chung nga re/ mi dam pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dkara'o// chos bstan pa rnyed par dka' 'o//
386b2(dkon brtsegs): dal ba bum sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' 'o// mi pham pa ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis/ da khyod kyis mngon par sbyor la sgrubs shig/ mi dam pa chos
386b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtang ba chen po bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs
386b4(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis shig/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi pham pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
386b5(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa// 'di 'dra 'di dag thos mi 'gyur// dpa' bo gang dag don grub pa// de dag gsung 'di thos par 'gyur// rang gis 'od
386b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni// gus dang bcas pas chos thas pa// de dag dga' ba dam pa'i thob// sgrub can dang dman dang bram rnams kyis// sangs rgyas
386b7(dkon brtsegs): chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus// gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyad la slob// dper na skyes bu long ba mum bung na/ lam yang mi shes bstan par ga la
387a1(dkon brtsegs): nus/ de ltar nyan thos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes mi rtogs sems can gzhan ci spos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen// lha klu d+ha mi ni gnod sbyin
387a2(dkon brtsegs): thos min// sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin// gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs// ye shes rnam dag don dam mkhas gyur te/
387a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag bskal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan rjod byed kyang // de dag bar du mya ngan 'das gyur gyi// bskal pa bye ba mang por rab brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes tshad
387a4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed mi 'gyur te// de ltar rgyal ba'i ye shes ngo mtshar to// de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i rang bzhin mi// gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te// rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te// sangs rgyas nyid
387a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod// brgya la ma na nI mi yi lus rnyed la// brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// dang dang shes rab yun ring rnyed par 'gyur// de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus
387a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed/ 'gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'ang thos nas ni// bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mos skyed pa// de dag 'das pa'i dus na nged dang bshes/
387a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
387b1(dkon brtsegs): bo// dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams la sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba zag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba/
387b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni sngon sems skyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba
387b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
387b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes bya bar bla na med pa yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
387b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gshegs/
387b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/
387b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang
388a1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang ngo // me tog man ra ra ba dag kyang sa la pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// lha dang mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par gyur to//
388a2(dkon brtsegs): 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du'ang rjes su li rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub
388a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang
388a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
388a5(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//
388a6(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar
388a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ sh+lo ka dgu brgya ste bam po gsum mo//
